loans.name: Umayah

texts.en: Umayah is a married woman and the mother of four. She is a conservative person, so she asked her husband to appear in the photo instead of her.They live together in Zarqa. The oldest son opened a small shop to sell cleaning products and materials. His father works there to help his son. Umayah wishes to take out this loan so she can also participate in helping her son. This is a chance to improve and expand their shop by getting other types of cleaning products and increase their profits.

loans.use: to get more types of detergents

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Don Pedro tiene la edad de 46 años, casado, padre de dos hijos de 17 y 18 años de edad, estudiantes, su esposa es costurera y hoy en día Pedro tiene su propio negocio, un recorrido en mini microbús que trabaja como transporte escolar
Al inicio trabajo en la agricultura, tierras de sus padres, años más tarde comienza a trabajar de chofer privado, luego su papa le heredo parte de tierras lo que vendió y compro el microbús, y que hasta hoy ah sido su medio para salir adelante con su familia. Aunque ahora sus ganancias son menos por el costo del combustible.
Ha adquirido este préstamo, en Afodenic con el propósito de dar mantenimiento a su vehículo, en comprar  4 llantas, para seguir trabajando en condiciones buenas y buen servicio. El cual está contento ya que no tenía todo el capital para esta compra y que pagara en plazos accesible.
texts.en:
Don Pedro is 46 years old, married and the father of two children who are 17- and 18-year-old students.  His wife is a seamstress and nowadays Pedro has his own business, a route in a small minibus that acts as a school bus.

Initially, he worked in agriculture on his parents' land.  Years later he began to work as a private chauffeur.  Then, he inherited from his father a part of the land which he sold and bought the minibus and that, up to today, has been his means to help his family get ahead, although now his earnings are less because of the cost of fuel.

He has acquired this loan from Afodenic with the purpose of maintaining his vehicle by buying four tires in order for it to continue working in good condition and in good service.  He is happy for this since he didn’t have all of the capital for this purchase and he will pay in affordable installments.

loans.use: to buy four tires in order to continue providing a good service in school transportation.

loans.name: Eang

texts.en:
Eang is 34 years old and a resident of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She happily lives there with her spouse and a teenage kid attending a local school. Eang aims to send her child to a college after he graduates from high school. This encourages Eng to work harder for her child’s education. 

Eang recently is in the business of rice farming and fishing as the main source of income for the family. Eang has been in this type of business for over 11 years. At present, she would like to borrow some funds to add to her savings to purchase a plot of farmland to increase her land and produce more output. She hopes that her business will grow and thus boost her profit to cope with the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of farmland

loans.name: Duo Semillas De Esperanza Group

texts.es: Dúo Semillas de Esperanza , este grupo está integrado por Lidia Oneida Ella tiene 22 años de edad  es casada y  tiene una hija pequeña,  nos cuenta que se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos a mano desde ya hace varios años, desde que inició su elaboración de fajas los vende a un buen precio a otras personas que salen a vender a otros pueblos, y es así como ella está luchando con su negocito, ahora ella nos está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la confección de tejidos típicos (fajas) y también desea comprar su producto por mayor ya que por su compra por mayor le dan su material a un buen precio, su sueño más grande es aumentar sus ventas y de esa manera ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Dúo Semillas de Esperanza (Two Seeds of Hope) is a group to which Lidia Oneida belongs. She is 22 years old, married and has a young daughter. She says that she has produced hand-made woven goods for several years. Since she started making belts she has been selling them at a good price to others who take them to sell in various towns. Thus, she is struggling to establish her little business.

Currently, Lidia is requesting a loan to purchase the basic materials to make her traditional woven goods (belts) and she also wants to purchase these products wholesale because by buying wholesale they give her the material at a good price.

Her biggest dream is to increase her sales and thereby help her family.

loans.use: to purchase the basic material to make traditional woven goods (belts).

loans.name: Lito

texts.en: Lito, a married father of three young children, lives in Bohol, Philippines where he has been a fisherman for five years now. Lito is requesting a loan of  8000PHP to buy new fishing nets and fuel for his fishing boat in order to increase his catch and income. He dreams of expanding his business so that he can send his children to school for a bright future.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and fuel for his fishing boat.

loans.name: Charisse Ann

texts.en:
Charisse Ann, a 27-year-old married mother of four young children, lives in Bohol, Philippines where she has operated a candle-making business for more than five years now. This is the source of the family's income.

Charisse Ann is requesting a loan for 8000PHP to buy additional materials for candle making to help her expand the enterprise. She hopes to earn greater income in order to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for candle-making.

loans.name: Felicia

texts.en:
Felicia is a married woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. She and her husband have been engaged in the fishing business for a long time now. Since all their five children are grown, they need to look after themselves. 

She is asking for a loan to buy fishing net, fish hooks, and gasoline, which are important in their livelihood. The loan will serve as additional capital so she can further sustain her fishing business and meet the basic needs like food and savings for future use. 

In the future, she would like to improve their livelihood by having another boat for fishing which will generate a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, fish hooks, and gasoline.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Dorina

texts.en:
Dorina is from the community of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married with one child, aged four years old. 

Dorina and her husband have been into the fishing business for five years now. She is asking for a loan to buy lead weights, fish hooks, and gasoline needed for their business. 

Dorina is hopeful that, with their loan and hard work, she will be able to send her child to school and give her a better future. Her profit will be used for family daily consumption, savings, and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy lead weights, fish hooks, and gasoline.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to get more food containers.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a married woman and a mother of two children. She works with her husband together in producing cleaning materials in their own small shop. They have been serving their own neighborhood and city very well. 

They wish to get a loan to produce more of the cleaning products to expand their market to include other cities, as the husband owns a car.

loans.use: to produce more of the cleaning products.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is 24 years old from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married with 2 children ages 2 and 4. She is engaged in a food vending business as well as selling fresh fish in her neighborhood. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients needed for her barbecue like soy sauce, catsup, cooking oil, vinegar, and more fresh fish to sell. She is motivated to work hard for the future of her children. Her profit will be used for the healthy diet of her family and reinvestment in the same business. In the future, she would like to have a bigger and more stable businesses for her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients needed for her barbecue like soy sauce, catsup, cooking oil, vinegar, and more fresh fish to sell.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a conservative woman and she preferred that her son appear in the photo instead. 

Mona is a 51-year-old divorced mother. Her son has just finished high school. His mother wishes to help him go to university to study Hospitality Management. She hopes and wishes to help him through his master’s degree as well so she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her son's educational fees.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam is a 45-year-old mother of five. She lives with her husband and children in Salt. 

She works from her own home in embroidery and sells her products to her family, friends, and neighbors. She wishes to get a loan to start her own little shop and sell to a larger number of people.

loans.use: to start her own little shop.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en:
Laila is a young artist who started her own project at home in Marka. Being such a good artist, she participated in lots of exhibitions. 

She wishes to get the loan so she can buy more raw materials and get to produce more art and participate in more exhibitions.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her artwork.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ceramic tile, blocks, sand, cement and iron to build a small pantry.

loans.name: Dúo Acatenango Group

texts.es: Dúo Acatenango. Este dúo está integrado por la señora Eloísa de 26 años de edad, doña Eloísa se dedica a la  venta de productos comestibles aunque no tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad ella ha podido aumentar la visita de sus clientes, ya que por su amabilidad conque ella atiende en su negocio la buscan muy seguido, ella está solicitando este crédito ya que necesita comprar más variedad en productos comestibles como(jabón arroz frijol y más,) que todavía ella no tiene en su negocio, espera que kava le pueda ayudar con el crédito solicitado ya que en estos momentos es cuando ella más necesita de su apoyo para levantar más su negocio en ventas.
texts.en:
Dúo Acatenango. Eloísa, age 26, is a member of this duo.  She sells food products.  Even though she has not been doing this for very long, she has been able to increase her customers’ visits.  Because she tends to her business very kindly, the customers seek her out often.

She is requesting this loan because she needs to buy a variety of grocery products like soap, rice, beans, and more.  These are things that she still does not have in her business.  She hopes that Kiva is able to help her with the requested loan.  Now is when she most needs your support to increase the sales in her business.

loans.use: to buy basic needs grocery products like soap, rice, beans, and more.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jose Luis de 36 años, casado y con 3 hijos, cuenta con una antigüedad de más de 12 años dedicándose a los trabajos de soldadura, en lo cual ya cuenta con una experiencia de más de 12 años, ya que su papa se dedicaba a lo mismo y eso influyo en él para iniciar su propio negocio, el cual ha conservado hasta la actualidad gracias a la calidad con la que realiza los trabajos. El cuenta con casa propia y en horas libres se dedica a realizar trabajos de mecánica, su esposa es ama de casa y lo ayuda atender a los clientes con mucha amabilidad. El Sr. Jose Luis solicita crédito para compra de material para la entrega de un pedido grande de uno de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 36 years old, is married, and has three children. 

He has been working in welding for more than 12 years. He has more than 12 years of experience because his father used to work in the same and that influenced him to start his own business. He has kept the business until today thanks to the quality with which the work is performed. He has his own house and dedicates his spare time to do mechanical works. His wife is a housewife and helps him to serve customers with great kindness. 

Jose Luis is applying for a loan in order to buy material to deliver a large order from one of his customers.

loans.use: to buy material

loans.name: Kafilath Adouni

texts.fr: Divorcée et mère deux enfants scolarisés dont le plus âgé a 12 ans et le moins âgé a 06 ans, Kafilath Adouni vend des mèches et des produits cosmétiques dans une boutique depuis 08 ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Soucieuse de renforcer son fonds de roulement et d'élargir son activité, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un appui financier à Finadev en vue de satisfaire les exigences de ses clients et de maximiser son intérêt. Le gain généré lui permettra de payer la scolarité de ses enfants et de fournir des soins médicaux pour son père qui est malade.
texts.en:
Divorced and mother to two children who are in school, of whom the oldest is 12 and the youngest 6 years old, Kafilath Adouni has been selling hair extensions and cosmetics in a boutique for 8 years. She gets her supplies in one of the markets of her area. 

Wanting to strengthen her working capital and to expand her business, she has requested and obtained financial support from Finadev in order to satisfy the demands of her clients and to maximize her interest. 

The generated gains will allow her to pay for her children's school fees and to provide medical care for her father who is ill.

loans.use: to buy 2 boxes of hair extensions, 1 box of gel and 2 cartons of creams of all kinds.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es una persona emprendedora, dedicada a su negocio propio venta de cosméticos en su casa de habitación desde hace mas de 8 años. Actualmente vive con sus 5 hijos y su esposo.
Doña Rosa el préstamo lo invertirá en el negocio en la compra de lociones, cremas, desodorantes, y aretes. Doña Rosa espera crecer más con el negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
Los sueños de Doña Rosa en poco tiempo tener una tienda más grande y así tener mejores ingresos y darles a sus hijos una buena educación y mandarlos a la universidad.
Choluteca, Honduras - Julio del 2012
texts.en:
Rosa is an entrepreneur, dedicated to her own business of selling cosmetics in her home for over eight years. She currently lives with her five children and her husband. 

Rosa will invest her loan in buying lotions, creams, deodorants, and earrings for her business. Rosa hopes to grow the business and meet the needs of her customers. Rosa dreams in having a larger store soon and thus higher incomes. 

She wants to give a good education to her children and send them to college.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, deodorants, and earrings for her business

loans.name: Martha Janneth

texts.es:
La Joven Martha, se dedica a su negocio de Venta de Ropa Nueva y usada, carteras y cosméticos, desde hace un año que empezó, ya que un familiar de ella  le envía la mercadería de los Estados Unidos y la otra la compra en varias tiendas de la ciudad, ofreciéndole variedad y calidad a sus clientes que en su mayoría son vecinas de la colonia donde vive y compañeras de trabajo ya que durante la tarde ella labora para una empresa distribuidora de calzado, ubicado en un centro comercial de la ciudad, a Martha siempre le gusto el negocio ya que desde pequeña su mama ha sido comerciante y le gusta mucho esta actividad.
Martha esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 10,000.00 para invertirlo en su negocio en la compra de ropa para niño, zapatos de segunda, licuadoras, vajillas y otros, Ella espera que PRISMA le pueda apoyar ya que necesita surtir su negocio.
Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Julio 2012
texts.en:
Young Martha has been selling new and used clothing, bags and cosmetics for the past year. A relative of hers sends her merchandise from the United States and the rest she buys in various stores in the city. Thus she offers variety and quality to her customers, who are mainly neighbors in the suburb where she lives or her co-workers since, during the afternoons, she works for a shoe distributing business located in the city’s commercial center.

Martha has always liked business because her mother was a merchant when she was a child, and she greatly enjoys this work.

Martha is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 lempira to invest in her business by purchasing children’s clothing, second-hand shoes, blenders, tableware and other items. She hopes PRISMA can help her because she needs to stock her business.

Tegucigalpa, Honduras – July, 2012

loans.use: to buy children's clothing, second-hand shoes, blenders, tableware and other items for her business.

loans.name: Tuzamurane / Mshsh Group

texts.fr:
Théoneste Léo fait partie du groupe Tuzamurane /Mshsh. Le nom du groupe signifie «s’entretenir financièrement». Il a 31 ans, il est marie avec 2 enfant de 2 ans à 4 ans. Il a 1 personne en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans de secondaire.
Théoneste Léo est agriculteur des tomates. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter 50kgs des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.
Pour faire croitre son agriculture des tomates, il planifie d’utiliser des semences sélectionner de bonne qualité pour augmenter la grande quantité pour satisfaire le marche. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir un grand distributeur des tomates. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire et construire une belle maison pour sa famille.
texts.en:
Théoneste Léo is part of the Tuzamurane /Mshsh group. The name of the group means "to support oneself financially." He is 31 years old, he is married with 2 children from 2 to 4 years old. He has 1 dependent other than his children. His level of education is 3 years of secondary school.

Théoneste Léo is a tomato farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use his loan in order to buy 50 kgs of fertilizers and to pay for manual labor. 

To grow his tomato farming, he plans to use select good quality seeds to increase the large quantity to satisfy the market. In the coming years, he would like to become a great distributor of tomatoes. With the profits, he plans to pay for school fees and build a beautiful house for his family.

loans.use: to buy 50 kgs of fertilizers and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: José Elenilson

texts.es:
José tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Se dedica al comercio de productos para el hogar, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre quien le enseño desde que era un niño y él lo ha venido desempeñando durante todo estos años. Vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos quienes les ayudan a preparar la mercadería que él lleva a comercializar en toda la zona donde reside.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar más mercadería: cacerolas, ollas, cocinas, licuadoras, hamacas, entre otros electrodomésticos, debido a que la demanda es alta y no puede cubrirla con la mercadería que tiene disponible. De esta manera él obtendrá mejores ingresos, satisfacera a sus clientes y podrá ampliar su negocio. Él desea adquirir un vehiculo de transporte, para ir a vender a otras zonas que visita a pie o en bus y esto le resulta más difícil y le consume mucho tiempo.
texts.en:
Jose is 37 years old, is married, and has three children. He sells household products. He learned this trade from his father, who taught him since he was a child, and he has been selling during all these years.  He lives with his wife and his children who help them prepare the merchandise that he carries for sale in all of the area where he resides. 

The loan that he is requesting is to buy more merchandise: pans, pots, cookers, blenders, and hammocks, among other electrical household appliances, since the demand is high and he is unable to meet it with the merchandise that he has available. In this way, he will obtain better profits, he will satisfy his customers, and he will be able to grow his business. He would like to purchase a transport vehicle to go to sell in other areas that he has to visit by foot or by bus, which is more difficult and time consuming.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise: pans, pots, cookers, blenders, and hammocks, among other electrical household appliances, since the demand is high and he is unable to meet it with the merchandise that he has available.

loans.name: Maritza Aracely

texts.es:
La joven Maritza es una persona muy emprendedora dedicada a su negocio propio, vive con su madre y sus 2 hijos. En el departamento de Choluteca en el sur de Honduras. Ella tiene más de 3 años de tener el negocio de Elaboración y venta de tortillas.
Maritza el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de maíz, leña y cal y molino. De esta manera incrementara más sus ventas.
Maritza con el préstamo espera incrementar sus ventas y atender mejor a sus clientes con mayor cantidad de producto, Espera vender más y tener mejores ingresos para tener mejor calidad de vida.
Los sueños de Maritza es poder ayudar a su madre mejorar la vivienda y darles una mejor vida a sus hijos.
Choluteca, Honduras - Julio del 2012
texts.en:
Young Maritza is a very enterprising person dedicated to her own business. She lives with her mother and her 2 children in the department of Choluteca in southern Honduras. For more than 3 years, she has had a business making and selling tortillas. 

Maritza will invest the loan in the purchase of corn, firewood, lime and a grinder. In this way, she will increase her sales. With the loan, Maritza hopes to increase her sales and to better serve her customers with a greater quantity of the product. She hopes to sale more and to have better profits to have a better quality of life. 

Maritza's dream is to be able to help her mother improve their home and to give a better life to her children. 
Choluteca, Honduras - July 2012

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, lime, and a grinder for her business.

loans.name: Gioconda

texts.es:
Gioconda sigue comercializando venta de ropa, ropa interior, calzado, también palmea tortillas, ayudándose más en sus ingresos, su esposo vende productos en cosméticos, sus hijos mayores todos trabajan y apoyan en sus gastos económicos, ya que todo está ah altos costos.
En todos estos años, ha logrado apoyar  a su familia, obteniendo sus propios ingresos, captado clientes, teniendo la ventaja de que sus clientes de tortillas le compren, al contado y al crédito. Gracias a estos financiamientos está en mejores condiciones de estabilidad, al poder pagar sus compromisos de pago, agua, luz, al ser a plazos accesible.
Comprara: ropa variada para ambo sexo y calzado y algunos encargos de sus clientes. para seguir aumentando sus ventas.
texts.en:
Gioconda continues selling clothing, undergarments, and footwear. She also makes tortillas by hand, helping to further her profits. Her husband sells cosmetic products, and her older children all work and support their economic expenses, since everything is at high cost. 
In all these years, she has managed to support her family, earning her own income, attracting customers, and having the advantage that her tortilla customers buy her products with cash and credit. Thanks to this funding, she is in a more stable position, and is able to pay her payment obligations, water, and electricity in affordable installments.  
She will buy: various clothing for both genders and footwear and some customer orders to continue increasing her sales.

loans.use: to buy various clothing and footwear to continue growing in sales.

loans.name: Divina Misericordia Group

texts.es:
Buenos Días!!!, tengan todos ustedes, saludos desde su hermano país del Perú. María del Carmen es una de las socias del Grupo DIVINA MISERICORDIA – EL TAMBO, que lleva ya 01 año de estar conformado. María nos dice, que el grupo que han formado  más que socios, son amigos, que al pasar se ha fortalecido.
María del Carmen tiene 63 años, soltera, y de profesión Docente, y ya se jubiló, recibe una pensión, pero no le alcanzaba para vivir cómodamente, es por eso que empezó alquilar  por horas el servicio de internet, en su única computadora que contaba y que era de su uso personal, poco a poco ahorrando al inicio todos sus ingresos, logro comprara más computadoras y acondiciono su sala en su casa para poder poner sus cabinas de alquiler de internet, el préstamo que está solicitando es para la compra de algunos suministros para sus computadoras como, parlantes, protectores de pantalla, audífonos, etc.
Ella muy agradecida por el apoyo que EDAPROSPO y equipo de KIVA le esta brindando para que pueda crecer su negocio.
María del Carmen viste con una blusa de color naranja, se encuentra en medio de los dos varones.
texts.en:
Greetings from your brother country of Peru. María del Carmen is one of the members of the group DIVINA MISERICORDIA - EL TAMBO, which was formed on year ago. Maria tells us that the group has made more than just members, they are friends, and that they have been strengthened over time.

María del Carmen is 63 years old, single, and from the teaching profession. She has already retired and received a pension, but it was not enough to live comfortably. For this reason, she started to rent internet service by the hour on the only computer that she had, which was for her personal use. Little by little, by saving all her profits at the start, she managed to buy more computers and conditioned a room in her house to be able to put in rent booths. The loan that she is requesting is for the purchase of some supplies for her computers, such as speakers, screen protectors, headphones, etc. She is very thankful for the support that EDAPROSPO and the KIVA team is offering her so that she is able to grow her business. 

In the picture, María del Carmen is in an orange shirt, between the two men.

loans.use: to buy speakers, screen projectors, and headphones.

loans.name: Angel Alfonso

texts.es:
Don Ángel tiene la edad de 36 años, de oficio mecánico automotriz, padre de tres hijos 12,14, y 15 años, estudiantes, separado de su esposa, al inicio comenzo aprendiendo la mecánica en un taller, siendo en día su sustento. Para el mejoramiento de su vivienda es su objetivo, siendo su casa de condiciones sencillas de parte de concreto y zinc, el cual quiere continuar las paredes de concreto para mejor seguridad de sus hijos, y poder tener un mejor cuido para sus pequeños hijos.
Siendo posible esta mejora con préstamo otorgado en Afodenic, que para él es de gran satisfacción avanzar en corto plazo. Materiales a comprar: bloques, arena, cemento, hierro, y comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Ángel is 36 years old and works as an automotive mechanic. He is the father of three children, aged 12, 14 and 15 years old who are students. He is separated from his wife. At the beginning, he started learning mechanics in a garage, what was his means of support. 

His goal is to improve his home, which is simple, made with parts of concrete and zinc. He wants to continue the concrete walls to provide more safety for his children, so he can take better care of his young children.

The improvement will be possible with a loan granted by Afodenic, so he will progress in a short term with great satisfaction. Materials to buy: blocks, sand, cement, and iron, so he can begin the work.

loans.use: to buy building materials to start building concrete walls

loans.name: Dúo Los Claveles De Santiago Group

texts.es: Dúo Los Claveles de Santiago, integrado por el representante Mariano de 21 años soltero, vive con su madre, Mariano se dedica a la venta de ropa para caballeros , camisolas, playeras, pantalones de lona, suéteres, y otros artículos, tiene su negocio desde hace tres años y empezó solo vendiendo camisolas y eso le dio la idea de buscar un local ya que vio la necesidad de aportar ingresos a su  hogar e invertir en sus estudios, sus amigos fueron sus primeros clientes ahora lo conoces por sus buenas ofertas y calidad de tela que vende, su sueño es lograr terminar de estudiar pues solo tiene a su madre ya que su padre falleció cuando apenas tenía 10 años, y de la misma manera también seguir ayudando a su madre con los ingresos.en la fotografia se muestra el negocio de de la siguiente socia por motivo de distancia.
texts.en:
Dúo Los Claveles de Santiago, is comprised by Mariano, who is 21 years old and single. He lives with her mother. Mariano sells mens' clothing, under shirts, sneakers, blue jeans, sweaters, and other articles of clothing. He has had his business for 3 years, and started only selling undershirts, which gave him the idea to find a location since he saw the necessity to contribute income to his household and to invest in his studies. His friends were his first customers, and now he is known for his good offers and the quality of fabric that he sells. His dream is to complete his studies, since he only has his mother because his father died when he was only 10 years old, and in the same way will continue helping his mother with income.

In the photograph, the business of the member is shown due to distance.

loans.use: to purchase various clothing: undershirts, sneakers, blue jeans, sweaters, and others for sale.

loans.name: Anoud

texts.en:
Anoud is a 26-year-old single lady. She is a university student who is paying by herself for her studies. 

She has applied for this loan so she can continue studying and apply for Masters degree studies.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Jameelah

texts.en:
Jameelah, 43 years old, is a married woman. Her husband is a taxi driver.

She started a small retail business selling bed covers to neighbors and friends to help her husband in paying the household bills. She has applied for this loan so she can bring in more goods to have a variety in what she sells.

loans.use: To buy more goods to have a variety in what she sells

loans.name: Ke

texts.en:
Ke is from the Baray district of Kompong Tom province. She is 32. She is a married woman who makes a living by planting rice and other seasonal crops on her farm. She is able to earn an income of around KHR 11,600 per day in order help support her family. Her husband also assists her in her farming business. Together, they are blessed with three single children who depend on their profit.
 
During this coming rainy season, Ke, as well as other farmers, will be busy with their farm work and will need more supplies for their production. Due to her lack of funds, Ke has decided to take out a loan in the amount of KHR 1,800,000 from Kiva lenders to rent a tractor to till her land for planting rice. She hopes to have a good harvest once her plants mature.

loans.use: To rent a tractor to till her land for planting rice

loans.name: Em

texts.en:
Most Cambodian people could make a profit from day to day by growing crops with their family. Em, one of them, is a rice cultivator living in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. 

He is 49, married, and is a responsible father of six children, three of whom are already settled for marriage, while the rest are still single and attending school. 

Em and his wife help each other to ensure a better standard of living by increasing their productivity at the field. Consequently, they aim to expand planting of various kinds of seasonal crops like potatoes, beans, and vegetables on their existing farmland, around three hectares of size, at Preah Vihear province. Therefore, they will be able to generate additional income each harvesting season. 

In regard to his purpose, Em decided to ask for a loan of KHR 2,500,000 through HKL to purchase farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for spraying. He believes that this will allow him to make more revenue to satisfy their living needs.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for spraying.

loans.name: Basma

texts.en:
Basma, a 40-year-old conservative married woman, asked her husband to take her place in the photo for cultural reasons.

Basma’s husband has an event equipment supply shop; he has more than one DJ set. She has applied for this loan to support her husband’s business and start a small band under his supervision.

loans.use: to support her husband’s business and start a small band.

loans.name: Mukama Mwesigwa Group

texts.en:
Mukama Mwesigwa is one of the institution's oldest groups. From the loans, the group members have accumulated many assets, like motor vehicles and motorcycles, and have built homes. The group's treasurer revealed that the UGAFODE loans have just been a blessing to their businesses and families, which is the reason for their consistency. They never get in trouble from not paying back their loans, and their businesses have expanded.

Livingstone has been a member of this group since 2000. He rears pigs to supplement his meagre income as a tax driver. From these loans, he is able to meet his family's needs and educate his three children. His major challenges now are the economic crisis and high cost of fuel, which in turn affects his salary. He will use the loan to buy pigs to sell. He hopes he will be able to accumulate enough money to build his own house, since he is renting at the moment.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Cheng

texts.en:
Cheng, age 33, is a hardworking farmer in her community. Her rice farming business has become the major source of her family’s income, which she spends on food and her daily needs. She always has her husband's support in her business. They happily work together in their field to support their children’s education and provide them with basic necessities. Together, they have given birth to four children who are currently studying in a local school in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province.
 
Cheng wants to manage her business progressively and increase her outcome. In order to reach her goals, Cheng needs financial assistance from Kiva lenders and HKL to purchase a water pump to carry water to her fields. Cheng will be able to effectively distribute the water between her rainy-season rice and dry-season rice. She hopes to have a good harvest each season.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump for her rice farm

loans.name: Essorongda De Lawai Group

texts.fr: Homme âgé de 33ans, Monsieur Essotina fait partie d’un groupement qui se nomme « ESSORONGDA DE LAWAI ». Pour un bon avancement du groupement, il a été nommé par les autres pour les diriger. Ils sont des femmes et d’hommes qui ont foi à la terre et cultive tous la terre il y a un temps. Monsieur Essotina est père de 06 enfants tous sont  encore sur les bancs d’école. Il est agent de sécurité et en même temps cultivateur, sa conjointe est ménagère. Il sollicite ce prêt pour s’approvisionner en outils de travail. Il veut assurer la scolarisation de ses enfants, transformer son champ en une grande ferme agricole et faire vendre ses produits à l'étranger.
texts.en:
A 33 year old man, Essotina is part of a group that is called "Essorongda de Lawai." To allow for good group development, he was nominated by the others to lead them. They are women and men who have faith in the earth and have farmed all the [available] earth for some time. 

Essotina is father to 6 children who are all still in school. He is a security guard and at the same time farmer, his spouse is a housewife. He is requesting this loan to stock up in tools. He wants to ensure his children's schooling, transform his field into a large agricultural farm and sell his products outside the country.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Rubi Esmeralda

texts.es: La Sra. Rubí  de 32 años de edad es casada y con 4 hijos, cuenta con una antigüedad de más de 1 año, su esposo y ella trabajan en maquiladora y  con esfuerzo han sacado a su familia adelante ella cuenta con casa propia, y tiene pensado ir ampliando para dejarles un buen patrimonio a sus hijos. La Sra. Rubi  solicita crédito para iniciar barda ya que la inseguridad ha incrementado y sabe que con esto podrá tener a su familia mejor protegida.
texts.en:
Rubí, age 32, is married and has four children.  She has over one year of experience, and she and her husband work in a factory.  With effort they have gotten their family ahead.

She has her own house, and she plans to expand it in order to leave a good inheritance to her children.

Rubí is requesting a loan to start a wall because the lack of safety has increased.  She knows that with the wall she will be able to have her family better protected.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime for her business.

loans.name: Kum

texts.en:
Kum is 53 years old. Despite her age, she's still strong enough to manage a rice farming business as well as a hog raising business. She is very diligent in her two projects because she wants to improve her living standard and satisfy her basic needs. 

From each business, Kum can earn approximately 10000 KHR per day. Her husband is also involved in these types of businesses and helps her manage the maintenance of the rice field. 

To make progress in her farming business and keep developing it, Kum would like to ask for some funds through HKL to purchase farm supplies such as fertilizers and herbicides to ensure healthier crops. In the future, Kum wants to expand her current businesses and make them more viable and profitable.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies such as fertilizers and herbicides to ensure healthier crops.

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres De Xetzac Group

texts.es:
Dúo Mujeres de Xetzac,  Este Dúo Está integrado por la señora Valentina de 51 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de Ropa y venta de zapatos en el mercado Municipal de Tecpan , desde hace años ella se dedicó a su negocio y gracias a Dios ha Aumentado bastante el esposo de ella trabaja como chofer de un bus extraurbano y con el sueldo que gana apoya a su esposa a cubrir  los gastos de la casa ya que gracias al apoyo de él, doña Valentina ha Podido salir adelante con su negocio.	
El sueño de ella es poder tener un negocio más grande para generar más ganancias y por medio de ello poder mandar a sus hijos a la universidad. en la fotografia aparecen en el negocito de la siguiente socia por motivo de distancia.
texts.en:
"Dúo Mujeres de Xetzac" ["Two Women of Xetzac"]. This duo includes Valentina, who is 51 years old and works selling clothing and shoes at the municipal market of Tecpan. She has dedicated herself to her business for years, and "thanks to God," she has expanded it quite a lot. Her husband works as a bus driver outside the city, and with the salary he earns he helps his wife to cover the household expenses. Thanks to his support, Valentina has been able to get ahead with her business. 
	
Her dream is to be able to have a larger business to generate more earnings, and through this, to be able to send her children to the university. In the photograph, they are depicted at the small business of the other group member, for reasons of distance.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Olga Yeyinou's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Olga Yeyinou, la responsable est âgée de 35 ans. Mariée et mère de cinq enfants dont quatre enfants scolarisés, elle a encore une domestique à charge. Elle vend des couches bébé, des pinces à linge et de la bonneterie depuis 08 ans puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le souci d'augmenter son pouvoir d'achat et d'élargir son activité, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev en vue de fournir des soins médicaux adéquats à ses enfants et de construire une latrine dans leur maison. Olga Yeyinou se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
It concerns a group of two people mutually guaranteeing one another. Olga Yeyinou, the person in charge is 35 years old. Married and mother to five children of whom four go to school, she still has a domestic servant under her responsibility. She has been selling baby diapers, clothes pegs and hosiery for 8 years and gets her supplies in one of the markets of Bénin. 

With the aim of increasing her buying power and expanding her business, she has requested and obtained a micro-loan from Finadev in order to provide adequate medical care to her children and to build a latrine in their house. Olga Yeyinou is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy 3 cartons of baby diapers, 1 carton of clothes pegs and 2 cartons of hosiery.

loans.name: Mabiya

texts.fr: Afin de contribuer aux dépenses du foyer, madame Mabiya âgée de 49ans a appris la couture. Après sa formation elle a ouvert un atelier dans lequel elle coud des habits à ses clients. Elle maitrise bien son domaine car il y a 22ans qu’elle exerce cette profession. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins de ses nombreux clients elle sollicite l’aide de WAGES pour un premier prêt. Ce montant l’aidera à acheter des machines pour le renforcement de son activité. Elle veut assurer la prospérité de son activité et l’épanouissement de la famille. Il est à préciser qu’elle est mariée à un enseignant, ils ont 02 enfants qui sont scolarisés  en charge. Ils sont âgés de 17 et 15ans.
texts.en:
In order to contribute to the expenses of the home, 49-year-old madam Mabiya learned to sew. After her training she opened a workshop within which she sews outfits for her clients. She masters her field well as she has been practicing her profession for 22 years. 

To better respond to the needs of her numerous clients she is requesting help from WAGES for a first loan. This amount will help her to buy machines to strengthen her business. She wants to ensure the prosperity of her business and the self-fulfillment of the family. 

It is to be stated that she is married to a teacher, they have 2 dependent children who are in school. They are 17 and 15 years old.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines.

loans.name: Marie Geradine Atchabi

texts.fr: Agée de 38 ans, Marie Géradine est mariée et mère de quatre enfants scolarisés dans une école de la ville dont le plus âgé a 16 ans et le moins âgé a 04 ans. Elle a une baraque où elle vend des boîtes de conserve, de macaronie, des savons et d'autres articles depuis 07 ans. Elle se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés de la place. En vue d'agrandir son stock et de combler les attentes de sa clientèle, Marie Géradine a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev. Ce financement lui permettre d'accroître son revenu additionnel et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Elle envisage aider son mari à achever la construction de leur maison.
texts.en:
38 years old, Marie Géradine is married and mother to four children in school at a school of the city. The oldest is 16 and the youngest is 4 years old. She has a shed where she has been selling canned goods, macaroni, soaps and other items for 7 years. She restocks in one of the markets of her area. 

With the aim of expanding her stock and to satisfy the expectations of her clientèle, Marie Géradine has requested and obtained financing from Finadev. This financing will allow her to grow her additional revenue and to participate in her children's schooling. She envisions helping her husband to finish the construction of their house.

loans.use: to buy 1 carton of macaroni, 1/2 carton of boxes of sardines, 1/2 carton of milk, 1 carton of soap and 10 bags of rice.

loans.name: Fatoumatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatoumatou est mariée à un imame. Elle est âgée de 32ans. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du ménage, elle vend depuis 2002 dans une boutique des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle rencontre par moment de la concurrence sur le marché et sollicite dans notre institution un second crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Avec les profits, elle veut ajouter la vente des denrées alimentaires, avoir des enfants et mieux s’occuper d'eux.
texts.en: Mrs. Fatoumatou is married to an imam. She is 32 years old. In order to help her husband with family expenses, since 2002 she has been selling groceries in a  store. At the moment, facing market competition, she is requesting a second loan from our institution to replenish her stock. With the profits, she would like to expand her food business, so as to be able to have children and provide well for them.

loans.use: to buy basic food items.

loans.name: Nan

texts.en:
Nan is 39 years old and a married woman who has been residing in Siem Reap province with her spouse and three children. One of her children is now employed in a supermarket in the province, helping Nan with income to contribute to elevate their living standards. Nan has devoted her lifetime to rice farming and hog-raising businesses with the full support of her husband and her teenaged children. She has been doing this for almost 10 years.

Nan would like to make improvements in her farming project and develop her living conditions. Therefore, she has applied for a loan of USD 1,200 to purchase a piece of land, fertilizers for her crops and feed for her pigs. Through this investment, Nan hopes that her standard of living will be better in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of land to expand her farming business.

loans.name: Ganiyatou

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de trois enfants scolarisés dans la ville, Ganiyatou est une vendeuse ambulante des ustensiles de cuisine depuis 02 ans. Elle fait ses approvisionnements dans l'un des marchés du Bénin et de l'extérieur. En vue de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a bénéficié d'un financement auprès de Finadev. Le surplus généré lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et d'épargner afin d'aider son mari à construire des chambres à louer.
texts.en:
Married and mother to three children in school in the city, Ganiyatou has been a street trader of cooking utensils for 2 years. She gets her supplies in one of the markets of Bénin and from outside of the country. 

With the aim of strengthening her business and to satisfy the demands of her clients, she has requested and benefited from financing from Finadev. 

The surplus generated will allow her to participate in her children's schooling and to save in order to help her husband to build rooms to rent.

loans.use: to buy 8 dozen basins and 10 dozen bowls of all kinds.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es:
La señora Ernestina tiene 62 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos; pero ya no viven con ella. Desde hace más de 45 años se dedica a trabajar en la crianza de cerdos y en la crianza de ganado. Ella aprendió estos trabajos, por medio de su esposo que desde que se casaron trabajan juntos con los animales. En la actualidad, posee más de 9 cabezas de ganado y 13 cerdos, es una persona que durante todo el día pasa trabajando en la granja de animales, los cuales los produce y luego los comercializa los días miércoles y domingo en el tiangue del municipio en donde ella vive. 

Doña Ernestina compra el concentrado de los animales cada 8 días, los días miércoles ella sale de casa por ser día del comercio, donde hay transporte hasta su casa, debido a que en los otros días no hay movimiento de vehículos.  Ella sale desde las 5:00 a.m. para adquirir el concentrado para llegar al mediodía a su casa.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar concentrado, un par de cerdos de clase para mejorar la raza que posee y alimento para sus vacas. Con el financiamiento espera engordar más los cerdos que tiene y ponerlos a la venta en un par de semanas, para que se vendan rápido y poder comprar otros para engordarlos más seguido para que sus ingresos sean mejores, pues solo se dedica a eso.

Ella desea contar con una buena granja para dejársela a su nieto que es el que vive con ella y es el que le ayuda, también quiere brindarle el estudio a su nieto, así como lo hizo con sus hijas que son enfermeras.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ernestina is 62 years old, is married and has three children, but they no longer live with her.  For more than 45 years she has worked raising pigs and cattle.  She learned this work from her husband, and they have worked together raising animals ever since they married.  Currently, she owns more than nine head of cattle and 13 pigs.  She is a person who works all day on the animal farm, raises the animals and then sells them on Wednesdays and Sundays at the city market near where she lives.  

Mrs. Ernestina buys the feed for the animals every week.  On Wednesdays she leaves home since it is a market day and there is transportation to and from her home, since on other days there are no vehicles.  She leaves at 5am in order to buy the feed and to return home by noon.  

The loan that she is requesting from the Campo Foundation is to purchase concentrated feed and a pair of quality hogs in order to improve the breed that she possesses, and to purchase cattle feed.  With the loan she hopes to fatten the pigs that she has and sell them in a few weeks, so that they will sell quickly and she will be able to buy others to fatten them and to continue so that her income improves.  This is her sole job.  

She hopes to have a good farm to leave to her grandson who lives with her and helps her.  She also wants to offer her grandchild the opportunity to study, like she did with her daughters, who are nurses.

loans.use: To buy concentrated feed and a pair of high quality pigs in order to improve the breed of the pigs that she owns and to purchase feed for cattle.

loans.name: Jocotal Group

texts.es:
El grupo el Jocotal lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es María Lucrecia quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 5 años  e invertirá el crédito en la compra de azúcar, arroz, pan, queso, gaseosa, pollo, aceite…etc.
Las otras integrantes son Lila quien vende pan y Juana quien vende ropa usada y tiene una pulpería.
texts.en:
The El Jocotal group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people, one of whom is María Lucrecia. She has had a small grocery store for five years. She will invest this loan in the purchase of sugar, rice, bread, cheese, pop, chicken, oil, etc.
The other members are Lila, who sells bread, and Juana, who sells used clothing and has a small grocery store.

loans.use: to buy basic grains and other products to increase her business.

loans.name: Beydy Julissa

texts.es:
La señora Beydi de 22 años de edad, esta soltera y  no  tiene  hijos  y vive en la casa  de habitación de sus padres  en  el departamento de Valle al sur de Honduras. Ella se dedica desde hace más de 3 años al negocio de venta de ropa nueva, perfumería, accesorios y cosméticos. Sus ventas son diarias en su negocio que lo realiza de manera ambulante en Barrios y colonias de su Pueblo al sur de Honduras.
Beydi solicita su préstamo para la compra de Ropa nueva, lociones, accesorios y cosméticos,  para surtir más su negocio. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella lograra surtir un poco su negocio y por ende mejorar sus ingresos, su deseo es seguir trabajando con Prisma.
El sueño de Beydi es construir su propia casa de habitación.
San Lorenzo, Valle - Julio/2012
texts.en:
Señora Beydi, age 22, is single and has no children. She lives in her parents' home in the department of Valle in the south of Honduras. For over three years she has had a business selling new clothing, perfume, accessories and cosmetics. She sells every day going door-to-door in neighbourhoods and developments in her village in the south of Honduras.
Beydi is requesting a loan for the purchase of new clothing, lotions, accessories and cosmetics, in order to stock her business more. With the support of this loan, she will be able to stock her business a little and improve her income. Her desire is to keep working with Prisma.
Beydi's dream is to build her own home.

San Lorenzo, Valle - July 2012

loans.use: to purchase new clothing, lotion, accessories and cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay is 57 years old and a humble villager living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She lives there with her spouse, 65, and six children, most of whom are already married. Lay has been dedicated to a rice farming business for over 30 years. The professional skills she has were passed down by her ancestors from generation to generation, which enables her to keep developing this business while she operates it.

Lay used to have animals to maintain her rice field, but they were too old for the tasks. She sold them for money and she plans to buy a couple of young, strong cow instead. Due to the shortage of funds, Lay has requested additional capital of USD 800. She strongly believes that, through the help of the loan and her perseverance, she will uplift her family out of poverty and pursue a good standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a couple of cows for farming.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 56 years old and a widowed woman who takes high responsibilities to raise and provide education to her four children. She is proud of herself and happy that all of her children are already married and have independent lives based on their skills and knowledge. Chan’s children are all very grateful to her and they don’t want her to do a lot of farm work at her age as she did in the past. However, Chan doesn’t want to depend on her children’s income. Recently, she has been in business of cultivating rice and raising some piglets. This work is very agreeable to her because it is what she enjoys doing in her life. Up to now, she has been in this field for almost 35 years.

Chan would like to improve their farm to earn more from it. She would like to ensure healthier rice crops and pigs but she has insufficient funds now to do so. Therefore, she is asking for a loan of USD 750 to buy fertilizers, insecticides, pesticides, and feed for her piglets. Someday, Chan will achieve the economic stability that she wishes.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, pesticides, and feed for her piglets.

loans.name: Julia Bernardina

texts.es:
La señora Julia de 49 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 5 hijos  y vive en su propia casa  de habitación junto a su esposo y algunos de sus hijos  en el  en una aldea del departamento de Choluteca, Honduras., Ella se dedica desde hace mas de 4 años al negocio que es la venta de pan y tortillas. Sus ventas son diarias de lunes a domingo en su negocio, sus clientes son las personas que viajan hacia la capital de Honduras ya que su negocio lo tiene ubicado en la orilla de la carretera  de su pueblo como también así vecinos, amigos, familiares, entre otros ya que también vende a domicilio.
Doña Julia solicita su préstamo para la compra de maíz, harina, leña para la elaboración de pan y tortillas para surtir más su negocio. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella lograra surtir un poco su negocio y por ende mejorar sus ingresos, y su deseo es seguir trabajando con Prisma.
El sueño de Doña Julia es hacer mejoras a su vivienda.
San Lorenzo, Valle - Julio/2012
texts.en:
Señora Julia, age 49, is married and has five children. She lives in her own home with her husband and some of their children, in a small hamlet in the department of Choluteca, Honduras. For over four years she has had a business selling bread and tortillas. She makes her sales every day, Monday to Sunday, in her business. Her customers are people who travel to the capital of Honduras, since her business is located on the edge of her village's highway. Her customers also include neighbours, friends, and family members, among others, as she also sells from home.
Julia is requesting a loan for the purchase of corn, flour, and firewood for making bread and tortillas to stock her business. With the support of this loan, she will be able to stock her business a bit and improve her income. She wants to keep working with Prisma.
Julia's dream is to make improvements to her home.

San Lorenzo, Valle - July 2012

loans.use: to purchase corn, flour, and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Santos Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Santos de 45 años de edad, esta casada  y tiene 3 hijos  y vive en su propia casa  de habitación   en  el departamento de Valle al sur de Honduras. Ella se dedica desde hace más de 3 años al negocio que es la venta de abarrotería, refrescos, agua, jugos, granos Básicos, pan, entre otros. Sus ventas son diarias en su negocio que tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación en uno de los barrios  de su Pueblo al sur de Honduras.
Doña Santos solicita su préstamo para la compra de Azucar, pan, granos basicos, jogos y agua para surtir más su negocio. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella lograra surtir un poco su negocio y por ende mejorar sus ingresos, y su deseo es seguir trabajando con Prisma.
El sueño de Doña Santos es realizar mejoras a su casa y surtir mas su negocio para poder mejorar sus ingresos y su estatus de vida económico.
San Lorenzo, Valle - Julio/2012
texts.en:
Santos is 45 years old, married and has 3 children. She lives in her own home in the department of Valle in southern Honduras. She has been working for more than 3 years in her grocery store business, selling refreshments, water, juices, basic grains, bread, and other items. Her daily sales take place in her home in one of the neighborhoods of her town in southern Honduras.

Santos is asking for a loan in order to buy sugar, bread, basic grains, juices, and water in order to supply her business. With the help of the loan she will supply her store a bit and thereby improve her earnings, and her desire is to continue working with Prisma.

Santos dream is to make improvements to her home and supply her business to be able to increase her income and her financial standing.

San Lorenzo, Valle - Julio, 2012

loans.use: to buy sugar, bread, basic grains, juices, and water for her business

loans.name: N.clemence's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux membres en caution solidaire. Clémence, la responsable, est âgée de 44 ans. Mariée et mère de trois enfants scolarisés, elle vend des produits cosmétiques et de divers dans sa boutique depuis 05 ans puis s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du bénin et de l'extérieur. Soucieuse d'augmenter son chiffre d'affaire et de satisfaire les demandes de ses clients, elle a fait recours au micro crédit de Finadev en vue de maximiser son profit et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Elle envisage creuser un forage d'eau dans leur maison. Clémence se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en:
It concerns a group of two members mutually guaranteeing each other. Clémence, the person in charge, is 44 years old. Married and mother to three children in school, she has been selling cosmetics and diverse items in her boutique for 5 years. She gets her supplies in one of the markets of Bénin and from outside the country. 

With the aim of increasing her sales and satisfying the demands of her clients, she resorted to the microfinance institution Finadev with the aim of maximizing her profit and participating in the schooling of her children. She envisions digging a water well in their home. Clémence is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy 1 carton of hair extensions, 1/2 carton of perfume, 1/2 carton of spaghetti, 1/2 carton of soap and 1/2 carton of sugar.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is a married woman. She has 6 children in school. She started the business in 2005 and operates in a busy trading center many miles away from Lyantonde town. Annet wants the loan to buy sodas and other household items, such as sugar and soap, among others, for her retail shop. She also charges phones using the generator at her shop because the area has no hydroelectric power.  

With the loan, she will able to meet the needs of her customers. Her main challenge is stiff competition from other retailers and the cold weather which affects the demand for sodas. Annet is a very shrewd woman. Annet wishes to spread her business to the neighbouring villages if she gets enough funds, so that she can save enough money to send her children to secondary school.

loans.use: To buy stock for her retail shop (soda, soap, sugar etc)

loans.name: Shadha Group

texts.en: This group is called Shadha, which consists of four female members, Sala, Atab, Lolah and Samiah, who live in Aden, Yemen. Sala, 34, is married and has two children. She has had a house for six years. She started to build a room for herself and her husband. She would like remodel her house. On this occasion she needs the loan to buy building materials such as cement and lumber. She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and lumber for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lotions, creams and other personal care items.

loans.name: Ang

texts.en:
Ang is 32 years old and operates a general store in her community, Baray, Kompong Tom province. She is married and has a teenage child attending school. She started her business 7 years ago. She gives thanks to her business and her loyal customers, which allow her to pay for sustenance, other costs, and allowances for her child. She enjoys her work because at the same time she can build good relationships with local people.
Recently due to the high cost of transportation fees and the lack of a vehicle for household use, Ang’s family encountered financial difficulties in covering those expenses. In order to better her living conditions and satisfy her family’s transportation needs, she decided to look for a loan of KHR 4,000,000 to purchase a motorcycle for commuting. She hopes that through her loan, she can earn a better income and save a portion of it for the future emergencies of her family as well as for her child’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.name: Al-Krwan Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Krwan which consists of three women, Nariman, Abeer and Rua, and one man, Tofan. They live in Aden, Yemen.
Nariman is a happy woman who treats everyone well because of her opportunities to get ahead. She, like many people, has had good times and bad ones and has gotten ahead despite whatever stands in her way. She is 31 years old, married and has four children, most  of them in school.
She is worried about her house, so she applied for a loan of 50000 YER from AMB to remodel the inside of the house and thus make it more comfortable for her family. With great strength and dedication, she has become a better person.

loans.use: to remodel her house.

loans.name: Gs La Fe Group

texts.es:
La Señora Carmentina se dedica al comercio su actividad principal es la venta de artículos varios desde hace mas de 20 años, negocio que ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos, ella tiene 4 hijos y convive con su esposo, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y su negocio a sido bien administrado ya que a través del mismo le a dado el estudio a sus hijos y ha salido adelante con los gastos del hogar.
Doña Carmentina solicita el apoyo del préstamo para la compra de producto como ser ropa de varón, mujer y niño, perfumes, sandalias, y zapatos y otra parte la quiere invertir en el pago de alquiler de un local ya que su negocio a sido ambulante y ahora quiere establecerse.
Doña Carmentina sueña con adquirir este local el cual le generara mejores ingresos y podrá comprar más producto para la mejor atención de sus clientes, ella solicita el préstamo de manera grupal con las siguientes personas:
Rosa se dedica al comercio hace mas de 40 años su negocio es la costura.
Karla se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de comida y cuenta con 4 años de experiencia.
Danli, El Paraíso – Julio 2012
texts.en:
Carmentina’s main business and source of income for more than 20 years has been selling a variety of clothing.  She has 4 children and lives with her husband.  Carmentina is a very hard-working woman and her business has been run well. She has been able to educate her children and has gotten ahead with household expenses.
She is requesting the support of a loan to buy items such as men’s, women’s and children’s clothing, perfumes, sandals, and shoes, and she also wants to use the money to rent a stand since she has been a street merchant and now she wants to establish herself in one location.

Carmentina dreams of acquiring this stand where she will generate better income and she will be able to buy more merchandise to better serve her customers.  She is requesting a group loan with the following people:
Rosa, who has worked for more than 40 years in her sewing business.
Karla who has sold prepared food for 4 years
Danli, El Paraiso-July 2012

loans.use: to buy items such as men’s, women’s and children’s clothing, perfumes, sandals, and shoes for her business

loans.name: Nao

texts.en:
Nao is 28 years old, married, and responsible for two lovely young children. Nao helps her spouse earn income by dedicating herself to a rice farming business while her spouse provides carpentry work to local people. The main challenge in his business is that there are not too many customers buying his finished objects. However, he still gets orders from his frequent customers. With the generated income, they can afford to send their children to school and cover daily expenses.
Nao would like to help her husband in his business so she is asking for a loan in the sum of KHR 2,000,000 to purchase wood. Nao is very happy to receive this second loan to make improvements in her family-owned business. In the future, she plans to educate her two children up to university degrees.

loans.use: to purchase wood for her husband's carpentry business.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mao is 56 years old and in the business of cultivating seasonal crops on her existing farmland located in the Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She plants and harvests rice, a type of bean, and potatoes based on the season and the market demand. She typically earns approximately KHR 10,200 from this business. Mao has the support from her husband to secure healthy crops. She is the mother of four children – three married children and a single one.
To aid her farming process, Mao needs financial assistance from Kiva lenders in the amount of KHR 1,500,000. In this particular way, she can pay tractor-tilling fees and purchase bean seeds to sow on her land. Moa hopes to make a greater profit which will serve her family’s needs. She is very appreciative to all lenders giving her a constant support.

loans.use: to pay tractor-tilling fees and purchase bean seeds to sow on her land.

loans.name: Pel

texts.en:
Pel, 45, is a low-educated woman who was born and grew up on a family farm. Pel is married to a local farmer and has a child. During the time she was living with her parents, Pel found that life without higher education is likely to direct the family to poverty. Her experience leads her to be more productive in her farming business and she promises to herself that her only child must get a higher education. 
To maintain her business and ensure a consistent income for the family, Pel would like to take out a loan in the sum KHR 1,500,000 through HKL for renting a tractor to till her land and for the purchase of seeds for her farm project. This will enable her family to obtain a good output in the upcoming harvesting season.

loans.use: to rend a tractor to till her land and for the purchase of seeds for her farm project.

loans.name: Sath

texts.en:
Sath is 63 years old and a resident of Reussey Keo district, a suburb area of Phnom Penh. 

Since her husband passed away a few years ago, Sath has had big responsibilities for raising and educating her four children. But at the present time, they are all already settled for marriage. 

Sath has operated a business in local market of her neighborhood.   She buys fresh fish from her suppliers, and then she makes them become dried ones, which she sells to her customers. Through this, Sath can yield an average of USD 5 per day to cover household expenditures. One of her daughters serves her as her motivation in pursuing her retail business.

Because she lacks the money to increase her stock of fish for selling, Sath has applied for a loan of USD 700 to purchase more fish. She believes that it will be a valued fund to boost her profit, which she can use to better her living standard.

loans.use: to buy more fish to process and sell as dried fish.

loans.name: Siv

texts.en:
Siv is a resident from Baray district, where she cultivates land to make a living. Siv is now 52 years old and the widowed mother of a grown daughter, who is already married. 

Siv is a business-minded woman.  With the revenue from her farming, she reinvested back into raising hogs and thus increased her household income. Siv has her daughter and son-in-law to help her in the two businesses.

Her experience makes clear that Siv has a strong commitment to work out her plans and make her businesses more viable.  But because she lacks the money, she hasn't been able to make it possible.  That is why she would like to acquire a loan of USD 700 to purchase a plowing machine to maintain the rice field.

loans.use: to purchase a plowing machine for her rice field.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Antonio de 51 años de edad es divorciado y no tiene dependientes económicos. A pesar de las circunstancias que ha tenido en la vida nunca ha dejado de luchar para salir adelante siempre impulsado por el deseo de superación personal. El trabaja en una carnicería de la localidad desde hace 6 años. El está solicitando nuestra ayuda para realizar mejoras de construcción en su domicilio específicamente su recamara. El agradecerá la ayuda que se le pueda brindar.
texts.en: Antonio is fifty-one, divorced, and has no dependents.  Due to circumstances in his life, he has never ceased fighting to get ahead.  He has always been motivated to improve himself.  He's been working in a local meat market for six years.  He's seeking our assistance to do some home improvements, specifically to his bedroom.  He'll be appreciative of the help he's able to receive.

loans.use: to make improvements to his bedroom.

loans.name: Chhun

texts.en:
Chhun, 32, is married and has two children who are still attending school. Educating his children up to college is the main focus for him and this encourages him to work hard to achieve it. He realizes that education is the best legacy he can pass on to them. And later, they will become professional and have a bright future. Chhun’s main business activities include farming and fishing, which provide a good income to satisfy his family. Chhun has been doing this for almost 10 years.

Now Chhun wants to obtain his second loan to purchase fishing nets and other types of fishing materials used in fishing. This loan will make it more possible to attain his goal. He will be able to support his children’s education with the generated income. He thanks all Kiva lenders in advance.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and other types of fishing materials

loans.name: Su

texts.en:
Su is from Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She is 74 years of age, a widow, and she has seven children: Three older children are already married and have independent lives, living separately around the province.  The other four children are still single and live together with her.

Su has been farming as her major business, having followed it with the fishing business for sometime now. This has become the primary source of income for Su. Her son supplies her with the fish he catches from a stream flowing through the province. 

Their fishing boat became ruined and unusable, so Su has seen their household income decrease.   In order to stabilize her family-owned business and make a consistent income, Su would like to borrow money to buy a new fishing boat with a machine that supports the fishing.

loans.use: to buy a new fishing boat to support her son's fishing.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en: Saleh is a 67-year-old married man with 7 adult children who lives in Sana`a, Yemen.  He was leased a house that he strives to keep up in order to offer a good life for his family.   He enabled almost all of his children to get an education and to get married and to build a house.  Now, he has applied for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy a refrigerator and a washing machine for his house.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and washing machine for his house

loans.name: Leyla

texts.es:
Leyla tiene 40 años, es una mujer emprendedora, pujante y soñadora, le gusta cumplir con lo que se propone. Tiene cinco hijos junto a Felix, su pareja. Vive en la casa que construyó junto a su conviviente desde hace 18 años. 
Su trabajo consiste en la venta de abarrotes y artículos de primera necesidad. Tiene un pequeño puesto alrededor del mercado principal de la ciudad. La paciencia es una de sus principales virtudes y eso le ha permitido enfrentar la tremenda competencia desde que se inició en este trabajo. Vende productos de limpieza y abarrotes variados como arroz, azúcar, aceite entre otros, pero todo al menudeo, compra al por mayor en las tiendas comerciales de manera semanal. Lleva en este trabajo desde hace 5 años, ha trabajado sola siempre, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su hermana. Su negocio le apasiona, pues le gusta estar en contacto con las personas, ya que a diario vive siempre nuevas experiencias, además su labor le permite generar los ingresos que necesita su familia para solventar los gastos básicos que requieren como alimentación y el pago de los servicios del hogar. Su gran deseo es tener su propio centro comercial en el que pueda distribuir al por mayor los productos que ahora ofrece.

Este es su préstamo número 15 con la institución MFP. Siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal donde la quieren mucho por ser muy responsable y solidaria. Agradece que le brinden este préstamo que será un respaldo para seguir implementando su negocio, y está convencida que seguirá siendo muy puntual y pagará sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 nuevos soles, comprará arroz en sacos, aceites, detergentes, jabones, azúcar, fideos, entre otros productos, para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Leyla, 40, is vigorous, enterprising and a dreamer; she likes to accomplish what she proposes. She has 5 children with her partner, Felix. She has lived with her common-law for the last 18 years in a house they built together. Her line of work is selling groceries and basic needs items. She has a small stand near the city’s central market. Patience is one of her principal virtues and that has allowed her to deal with the tremendous competition since she started her business. She sells items such as, cleaning products, various grocery items like rice, sugar and oil, among others, all at retail, but buys it wholesale, weekly, from the shopping mall. She’s had this business for 5 years, always working alone, but sometimes she gets help from her sister.

Leyla is passionate about her business, as she likes being in touch with people and living new experiences every day. Her work generates the income her family needs to cover the basic cost of living, like food and household utilities. Her great desire is to have her own store where she can sell the same products she offers today, but sell them wholesale.

This is her 15th loan with MFP. She has always been a good member at her Communal Bank where she is loved for being responsible and supportive.

She is grateful for this loan, which will be the support she needs to continue implementing her business; she knows she’ll continue being punctual and will make her payments on time as she has with her previous loans up to now. 

With the loan she is requesting of 1000 new sols ($400), she’ll buy bags of rice, oils, detergents, soaps, sugar, noodles, among other products, to continue her work.

loans.use: buy bags of rice, oils, soaps, etc., to increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Meas

texts.en:
Meas is a conscientious woman who has dedicated most of her lifetime to farming. She is 63 years of age and married with two children. She happily lives with her spouse and their children in Baray district of Kompong Tom province. 

Meas and her spouse have well cooperated in bringing up their children and providing them with good opportunities for education. Normally, the couple  can earn around KHR 11,200 each from their farming, the sole source of their family’s income.

Meas would like go far in her business and provide a satisfying income for the family.  For this matter, Meas is asking for an additional capital to purchase farm inputs, such as bean seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicides. She hopes that his loan will provide her a fruitful harvest and bring financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs, such as bean seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and herbicides.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como oficial das forças armadas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, areia, pedra, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e desenvolver um negócio de agro-pecuária, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de transporte e o elevado preço do material de construção.
texts.en:
Married with three children attending school, Tomas lives in his own home with his family and does not support anyone else.
He works as a military officer. With this loan, he wants to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone and similar) to continue the work on his home.
In the future, he wants to finish the work on his home and develop an agricultural-livestock business. He is committed to the repayment of the loan due, in order to be able to request future loans with Hluvuku.
His challenges are the lack of transportation and the high price of the construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone, and similar) to continue the work on his home.

loans.name: Gs 11 De Julio Group

texts.es:
Daisy, se dedica al comercio su actividad principal es la venta de abarroteria (pulpería) ella cuenta con 3 años de experiencia, negocio que le ha ayudado a salir adelante ya que ha sido la principal fuente de ingresos y la de su familia, su negocio esta ubicado en la calle principal de su comunidad, el cual transita gran cantidad de personas que trabajan en las fabricas de siembra de tabaco, misma que son clientes de Daysi.
Daysi esta solicitando el apoyo con el préstamo para la compra de productos como ser: azúcar, manteca, jabón, arroz, embutidos, pastas, espaguetis y otros para la buena atención de los cliente,  ya que ella generalmente le vende la mercadería al crédito, ella sueña con tener la mejor pulpería de la zona y abastecer de producto a sus clientes, también quiere comprar una motocicleta para ir a vender mercadería a la montaña.
Daysi esta solicitando el préstamo de manera grupal con las siguientes personas;
Betina, se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de abarroteria (pulpería, venta de Granos Básicos, repuestos de bicicleta, útiles escolares) ella cuenta con  4 años de experiencia.
