Heliodora, se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de ropa de varón, camisas, faldas, ropa interior ropa de niño, y la pulpería  ella tiene 5 años de experiencia en el mismo.
Danli, El Paraíso - Julio 2012
texts.en:
Daysy earns her living in business, primarily selling groceries.  She has three years of experience.  The business has helped her get ahead and has been her family's main source of income.  The store is located on a main street of her community, frequented by lots of people who work in the tobacco factories, who are also her customers.

Daysi is seeking the support of a loan to purchase products like sugar, butter, soap, rice, sausages, cookies, spaghetti, and other items so she can provide good service to her customers.  She typically sells on credit, so she dreams of having the best grocery store in the area, stocked up with all the products her customers want.  She also wants to buy a motorbike to go and sell merchandise in the mountains.  

Daysi is seeking a group loan with the following borrowers:  Betina, a businesswoman with four years of experience, who has a grocery store (selling basic grains, bicycle spare parts, and school supplies);  and Heliodora, who has five years of experience, and whose principal business is selling men's clothing, shirts, skirts, undergarments, children's clothing, and groceries.

loans.use: to buy sugar, butter, rice, sausages, cookies, spaghetti, and other items for her store.

loans.name: Majdh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Majdh. It consists of Ahlam, Krima, Ghadh, Majdh and Amnh, ladies who applied for a loan of 420000 YER.

Majdh is a 33-year-old married woman who sells clothes, comforters, sheets and electric appliances in her stand located in Aden, Yemen.  She applied for a loan from AMB and will use the loan to buy a variety of electric appliances to stock her business. The reason for requesting the loan is that she received some orders but she did not have the necessary capital to get the products. Majdh’s business challenge is competition and high seasonal demand so she will use profits to increase her merchandise and thus her sales.

loans.use: to buy a variety of electric appliances to stock for her business

loans.name: Al-Maidan Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Maidan.  It consists of 4 members who are ladies: Aidh, Samiah, Muna and Wafa. They live in Aden, Yemen.

Aidh is 49 years old and married with two children.  She works in food production. This business gives her substantial income, which allows her to provide for her family and meet her own needs. In order to increase her working capital, she has requested a loan of 40000 YER to buy sugar, flour, canned food, etc. for her business.  In the future, she hopes to improve the quality of her food production.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, canned food, etc. for her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase women's clothing, such as blouses, pants, skirts, polo shirts and jackets for her business

loans.name: Ang

texts.en:
Ang is 28 years old and lives in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She is married, with three school-aged children. She has been in farming for many years, and she can earn approximately KHR 7,600 per day.  

Ang has been with HKL two times already and she paid off both previous loans successfully. She said that money was very helpful in developing her business as well as her living status. 

And now, she would like to have another loan of KHR 1,000,000 to add to her savings and buy a cow for her farming. She has positive hopes for the loan, and she believes she will be able to support her family’s daily living needs with the generated income.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for farming.

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en:
Nabil is a 31-year-old man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen.  He is a very pleasant person, happy and enthusiastic. He is married, with four children to whom he dedicates all of his efforts to get ahead in life. 

Nabil has a bachelor's degree.  Unfortunately, because he had to go to work to help his family and cover their living costs, he could not get a professional career. He would have very much liked to do so. 

He is working in the army, but he would like to work in another job in his free time.  So he applied for a loan of 500,000 YER from AMB to buy a taxi.

loans.use: to buy a taxi and become a taxi owner/driver.

loans.name: Rowaida

texts.en: Rowaida is a 49-year-old married woman caring for her seven sons and daughters with the small profit she makes from her tailoring business at home. She has applied for this loan to purchase more fabric and register her home tailoring workshop as a licensed business.

loans.use: to purchase more fabric and register her business.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Don Wilfredo, tiene 50 años de edad, El  se dedica a su pequeño taller de Elaboración y Venta de Fajas, desde hace mas de 30 años, ofreciéndole a sus clientes calidad en su trabajo, esta ubicado en su casa de habitación,  cuenta con dos empleados que le ayudan en la elaboración de las fajas, el sale a vender a Olancho, Choluteca y Comayagua, donde ya cuenta con varios clientes como tiendas que le compran su producto por mayor, trabaja de Lunes a Sábado ya que el Domingo el lo dedica para ir a la Iglesia, gracias a los ingresos que ha obtenido en su negocio ha logrado mantener a sus hijos y realizarle mejoras a su casa de habitación,  su actividad comienza desde las 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 5:00 de la tarde.
Don Wilfredo esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 25,000.00 para invertirlo en la compra de suela, hebillas, broches, hilos, resistol y forros, espera contar con el apoyo de la institución  para surtir su negocio.
Sus Planes a futuro es tener un negocio fuerte y rentable para el sustento de su familia.
Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Julio 2012
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 50 years old. For more than 30 years he has had a small workshop making and selling belts, offering his customers quality work. It is located in his home, and he has two employees who help him make the belts. 

He goes to sell in Olancho, Choluteca and Comayagua, where he already has several customers such as stores that buy his product at wholesale. 

He works Monday to Saturday, as Sunday he devotes to going to church. His work begins at 8:00 a.m. and goes until 5:00 p.m.

Thanks to the income he has earned in his business, he has managed to support his children and carry out improvements to his home. 

Wilfredo is applying for a loan in the amount of 25,000 lempiras, in order to invest it in the purchase of leather, buckles, clasps, thread, glue and lining. He hopes to have the support of the institution in stocking his business.

His plan for the future is to have a strong and profitable business so that he can support his family.

Tegucigalpa, Honduras – July 2012

loans.use: To buy leathers, buckles, clasps, thread, glue and linings for his business.

loans.name: Santos Balbina

texts.es:
Doña Santos es una persona muy emprendedora dedicada 100% a su negocio, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos. En el departamento de Choluteca en el sur de Honduras. Y tiene más de 15 años de tener el negocio de Pulpería.
Doña Santos el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de carne, pollo, arroz, frijoles, manteca, café, pan, y jabón de esta manera incrementara más sus ventas. Con el préstamo espera superar sus ventas y satisfacer y mejorar las necesidades de sus clientes.
Doña Santos espera tener mejores ingresos para tener mejor calidad de vida. Sus sueños es poder mejorar su negocio, en hacerlo más grande como un mini súper y de esta manera poder ayudar a su familia.
Choluteca, Honduras - Julio del 2012
texts.en:
Santos is a very enterprising person 100% dedicated to her business. She lives with her husband and 3 children in the department Choluteca in the south of Honduras. She has had this general store business for over 15 years. 

Santos will use the loan to buy beef, chicken, rice, beans, butter, coffee, bread and soap and in this way increase her sales. With the loan she hopes to increase her sales and meet the needs of her customers.

Santos hopes to improve her income so that she can have a better quality of life. Her dream is to improve her business, expanding it to small supermarket and in this way to help her family. 

Choluteca, Honduras - July 2012

loans.use: to buy beef, chicken, rice, beans, butter, coffee, bread and soap for her business.

loans.name: Dúo Maripositas De Magdalena Group

texts.es:
Dúo maripositas de magdalena
Este dúo está conformado por doña Marta Julia , ella tiene 48 años de edad y un hijo que tiene 17 años quien estudia su diversificado actualmente,  doña marta está solicitando el crédito para invertir en su tienda de ropa para dama, caballeros y niños , juguetes, ollas de cocina, y zapatos de todos los estilos, ella nos dice que le puso por nombre Miscelánea Martita hace cinco años comenzó su negocio ya que su esposo falleció y ella tuvo que ver que hacía para sacar a su hijo adelante su anhelo es ver que su hijo se gradué y continúe su universidad, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más en Calzado, Ropa, juguetes y más, mercadería y poder agrandar más su negocio.
texts.en:
Marta Julia is a member of the "Dúo Maripositas de Magdalena" (Little Butterflies of Magdalena") group. She is 48, and has a 17-year-old son who is currently in high school.

Marta is requesting the loan to invest in her store that sells women's, men's and children's clothing, toys, kitchenware, and shoes of all styles.

She tells us that she named it "Miscelánea Martita." Marta Julia started her business five years ago, as her husband passed away and she had to see what she could do in order to raise her son.  

Her greatest wish is to see her son graduate and go on to university. She is applying for this loan in order to buy more in the way of footwear, clothing, toys and other merchandise, and to be able to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more footwear, clothing, toys and other goods.

loans.name: Nancy Paola

texts.es:
La joven Nancy de 25 años de edad, es casada  y  tiene 1 hijo  y vive en su propia casa  de habitación   en  el departamento de Valle al sur de Honduras. Ella se dedica desde hace más de 3 años al negocio que es la venta de ropa nueva, perfumería, accesorios y cosméticos. Sus ventas son diarias en su negocio que lo realiza de manera ambulante en Barrios y colonias de su Pueblo al sur de Honduras.
Nancy solicita su préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva, perfumería, accesorios y cosméticos para surtir más su negocio. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella lograra surtir un poco su negocio y por ende mejorar sus ingresos, y su deseo es seguir trabajando con Prisma.
El sueño de Nancy es realizar mejoras a su casa y tratar de ubicarse en un punto estratégico de venta del mercado municipal de su pueblo y de esta manera generar mejores opciones de ingreso.
San Lorenzo, Valle - Julio/2012
texts.en:
Nancy is 25 years old, married, has a son, and lives in her own house in the department of Valle in the south of Honduras.  For three years, she has sold new clothing, perfumes, fashion accessories, and cosmetics.  She sells her merchandise daily at open markets in the neighborhoods and districts of her hometown in the south of Honduras.  

Nancy is asking for this loan to buy new clothing, perfumes, fashion accessories, and cosmetics to better supply her business. With the help of the loan, she will be able to supply her business, thus increase her income.  She hopes to continue working with Prisma.

Nancy's dream is to complete improvements to her house and to try to situate herself in a strategic selling location in the town market where she lives in order to generate better income opportunities.  San Lorenzo, Valle- July 2012

loans.use: to buy new clothing, perfumes, fashion accessories, and cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Marenco Group

texts.es:
El grupo Marenco lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Marbell de 26 años quien se dedica a la venta de chinelas desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo invertirá en chinelas, zapatos para niños, zapato deportivo, sport y calzado para hombres.
Las otras integrantes son Patricia Lucia quien tiene un taller de costura la cual inicio hace 8 años, Josefa tiene un taller de costura desde hace 12 años y Cristian vende ropa.
texts.en:
The Marenco group is made up of three hard-working, enterprising women.  One of them is Marbell who is 26 years old and for the past six years has sold sandals.  The loan will be used to buy sandals, kids' shoes, and athletic and casual footwear for men.  

The other members of the group are: Patricia Lucia who has a sewing shop that she started eight years ago; Josefa who has had a sewing shop for 12 years; and Cristian who sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy sandals, kids' shoes, and athletic and casual footwear for men.

loans.name: Duo Mujeres De Xenimajuyu Group

texts.es: Dúo Mujeres de Xenimajuyu, este Dúo está integrado por la señora Julia María de 47 años de edad tiene bajo su responsabilidad a sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado municipal de Tecpán ella viene realizando esta actividad desde hace varios años, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura en la aldea donde viven, él se dedica a la siembra de ejotes,tomate,chile y otros, la cosecha de su esposo es la que doña María vende en el mercado solo así ellos pueden recuperar el dinero invertido en la siembra, es por eso que ella está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más verduras para seguir con su venta, espera que le puedan dar ese apoyo que ella necesita.
texts.en: The group "Dúo Mujeres de Xenimajuyu" (Women Duo from Xenimajuyu) is formed by Julia Maria who is 47 years old, has three children, and sells vegetables in the Tecpan town market.  She has been selling vegetables for several years while her husband works in agriculture in the town where they live.  He grows green beans, tomatoes, peppers, and other vegetables.  It is her husband's harvest that Julia Maria sells in the markets in order to recuperate the money invested in the sowing of the seeds.  For this reason, Maria is asking for this loan to buy more vegetables to sell in the markets.  She hopes to receive the help that she needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan tiene 36 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Él junto con sus hermanos desde que eran unos niños se han dedicado a realizar trabajos agrícolas y a la crianza de ganado, en las horas libres le ayudaban a su papá en el taller de carpintería. A la edad de 15 años don Juan se dedico por completo a la carpintería, a la edad de 20 años se caso y se independizo de su papá y él instalo su propio taller de carpintería. 

La materia prima la adquiere en las acerraderas más cercanas a su vivienda; pero en algunos casos tiene que viajar mucho más lejos y pagar un medio de transporte para trasladarse.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar maquinaria para la carpintería y materia prima e insumos para necesarios la misma actividad. Con la inversión ella espera mejorar el servicio y la calidad de los productos que elabora, disminuyendo el tiempo de espera de sus clientes, para mejorar la economía familiar. Él desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más maquinaria y contratando a más empleados.
texts.en:
Juan is 36 years old, married and has three children. He and his brothers have been doing agricultural work and raising cattle since they were children. In his free time he used to help his father in his carpentry workshop. At 15 years of age Juan decided to devote himself completely to carpentry. At 20 he got married, became independent and set up his own carpentry workshop.

He obtains his raw materials in the saw mills near his house but sometimes he needs to travel much further and has to pay for transport. 

He his asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy carpentry machinery and raw materials and supplies necessary for his investment. With the investment he hopes to improve the service and quality of products he makes, decreasing the waiting time of his customers to improve the family's finances. He hopes to expand his business by buying more machinery and hiring more employees.

loans.use: to buy carpentry machinery and supplies.

loans.name: Martha Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Martha tiene 46 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Es una persona trabajadora que se dedica desde hace 4 años al cuido de ganado y especies menores. Esta actividad la aprendió desde pequeña cuando vivía con su mamá que trabajaba mucho. Por falta de recursos económicos doña Martha no pudo estudiar, cosa que lamenta pero eso no ha sido impedimento para no ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 

Ella compra tres quintales de concentrado cada mes, para alimentar a sus cerdos y ganado. Recorre treinta minutos en carro hasta un municipio en donde realiza las compras, debido a que en ese lugar le venden a buen precio porque es cliente conocida. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una vaca lechera para poseer otra fuente de ingresos a través de la venta de leche. Con el préstamo ella no se vera obligada a vender unos tres cerdos para comprar la vaca que aún le faltan dos meses para que estén listos para la venta y se estaría ahorrando todo eso. Martha estará recibiendo otro ingreso que le servirá para cumplir con la Fundación y obtener más ganancias. Ella ha pensado comprar más animales como cerdos, vacas para seguir creciendo en su negocio, hasta que se mantenga por si solo sin recurrir a créditos, estar libre de deudas y buscar la forma en que sus dos hijos se superen ya que ella no logro ese objetivo.
texts.en:
Ms. Martha is 46 years old, married, and has two children. She is a hard-working person who has been caring for cattle and small farm animals for four years. She began learning this activity when she was young, as she lived with her mother who worked a lot. Due to a lack of economic resources, Martha was not able to study, which is something she regrets. However, this hasn't been an impediment to her ability to assist her husband with the household expenses.

She buys three hundred pounds of food concentrate every month to feed her pigs and cattle. She travels thirty minutes by car to a town to make her purchases, because they sell to her at a good price there since she's a known customer.

The loan Martha is requesting from Fundación Campo is for buying a dairy cow so that she can have another source of income -- selling milk. With this loan, she will not have to sell three pigs to buy the dairy cow, as they are still two months away from being ready for sale and now she'll be saving all that. Martha is receiving another income that will help her to comply with the foundation and make more of a profit. She has also been thinking about buying more animals, such as pigs and cows, in order to continue growing her business until she can maintain it herself without recurring loans, be free of debt, and look for a way for her two children to get ahead, since she was not able to herself.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Alnoor Albasm Group

texts.en:
This group is called "Alnoor Albasm" and consists of 4 ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. Hayah is 44 years old and a mother of seven children between 29 and 7 years old.
She is a tailor and has been doing this job for 10 years now. With this loan, she intends to buy sewing notions (sewing tools) so that she will be able to work efficiently.

loans.use: to buy sewing notions (sewing tools) for her business

loans.name: Duo Torrelianas Group

texts.es: Dúo torrelianas este dúo está integrado por la señora Maudelia de 39 años de edad tiene 3 hijos de (20,17 y 5 años)inicio su negocio hace 5 años tiene una venta de chicharrones y carnes de cerdos   ella atiende en su negocio los fines de semana y entre semana se dedica a la venta de queso y crema, está solicitando este crédito porque necesita comprar más carne para elabora chicharrones y también para tratar de alquilar un local en el mercado de Mixco ya que sus ventas las realiza de forma ambulante desde ya les desea bendiciones y les agradece por la ayuda brindada
texts.en: Duo Torrelianas is made up of Maudelia, 39, who has three children (20, 17, and 5 years old). She started her business five years ago selling pork rinds and pig meat. She looks after this business on the weekends.  During the week she makes her living selling cheese and cream.  She is requesting this loan because she needs to buy more meat to prepare the pork rinds and also to try and rent a stall in the Mixco market because as of right now, all of her sales are made as a street vendor.  She sends blessings and gives thanks for the support.

loans.use: to buy meat for the preparation of pork rinds and to rent a stall.

loans.name: Duo Luz De Luna Group

texts.es:
Duo Luz de Luna.
Este dúo lo forma la líder del grupo doña Silvia Haydee, de 26 años de edad es madre soltera con una hija, y nos cuenta que se dedica a la crianza de marranos hace 5 años en su casa,  ya que su bebe aun esta pequeña no la puede dejar, para  salir a trabajar, su animales los crece durante 3 meses y después los vende y está solicitando este crédito porque necesita comprarle alimento a los animales ya que comen mucho y no tiene suficiente capital para mantenerlos, espera que se le ayude ya que es la única fuente de ingresos, también con el crédito piensa comprar más animalitos para la crianza y luego venderlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en: The group "Duo Luz de Luna" is by the leader Silvia Haydee who is 26 years old and the single mother of a daughter.  She has raised pigs at her home for five years because her daughter is still very young and she is unable to leave home to work.  Silvia raises her animals for three months, and then sells them.  She is asking for this loan to buy feed for the animals because they eat a lot and she doesn't have enough capital to maintain them.  She hopes to receive this loan as it is her only source of income.  She also wants to buy more baby animals to raise and to sell later at a better price.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and animals to raise and then sell.

loans.name: Alma Rosa

texts.es: La Sra. Alma Rosa de 56 años de edad es casada y no tiene dependientes económicos. Ella y su esposo están trabajando en una secundaria de la localidad, ella trabaja en la cooperativa de la escuela y su esposo es afanador de la misma. En esta ocasión Alma esta pidiendo de nuestra ayuda para invertir en su negocio para ofrecer mas variedad tanto a los alumnos como a los maestros de dicha institución.
texts.en: Alma Rosa is 56 years old, married, and does not have any economic dependents.  Alma Rosa and her husband are working in a secondary school in their community.  She works in the cafeteria of the school and he works in the same [cafeteria] as a janitor.  On this occasion, Alma is asking help from us to invest in her business in order to offer a greater variety for both the students and teachers of the school.

loans.use: to invest in her business.

loans.name: El Progreso Del Vallecito Group

texts.es: Saludos desde Perú les presentamos  al Grupo “El Progreso del Vallecito” la cual lo conforman 05 mujeres emprendedoras dedicadas a distintas actividades comerciales, siendo la gran mayoría vecinas de la zona, este grupo pasa a su 4to ciclo y han demostrado responsabilidad. Una de las integrantes es Ana de 36 años y su familia está conformada por ella su pareja y 04 pequeños. Ana se dedica a la venta de abarrotes hace más de 05 años, lo cual lo ofrece en un mercadito de su localidad. No fue fácil para ella sacar adelante su negocio, ya que nos comenta que tuvo  problemas económicos, pero con perseverancia y duro trabajo a podido recuperarse. Posteriormente desea poner una bodega es su vivienda, esto le permitiría estar cerca de sus hijos. Su último crédito lo destinara para la compra de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, leche, etc. para su puesto. Ana es la segunda del lado izquierdo viste chompa roja y pantalón rojo. La Alcancía Comunal “El Progreso del Vallecito” agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada ya que hacen posible su progreso.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru. We present the Group "Vallecito's Progress" which is made up of 5 women entrepreneurs engaged in various commercial activities, the majority of which live in the surrounding area.  This group is going on its 4th loan cycle and has shown responsibility in its previous loans. 

One of the members is Ana, 36, whose family consists of her partner and 4 children. Ana has made her living selling groceries for over five years which she sells from a market in her neighbourhood.  It was not easy for her to get her business ahead because she had financial problems, but with perseverance and hard work she was able to come through.  Later, she would like to have a small grocery store in her home so that she can be close to her children. 

She will use this loan to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, milk, etc. for her stall. Ana is pictured second from the left dressed in a red sweater and red pants.  The Group "Vallecito's Progress" is grateful for the assistance from the Kiva loans because it has made their progress possible.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and noodles.

loans.name: Duo Rosas De San Juan Group

texts.es:
DUO ROSAS DE SAN JUAN
Este Dúo Está integrado  por doña Magdalena de 29 años de edad, casada y madre de una niña de 7 años de edad,  doña Magdalena quien se dedica a la venta de artículos de  consumo diario desde  hace 8 años, como maíz, arroz, azúcar, cereales, aceite, gaseosas etc. Atendiendo a su clientela todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche,  también  vende los fines de semana  refacciones como tostadas, atol, panes, manjares,  gelatinas, helados, y refrescos, nos cuenta que gracias a Dios sus ventas son buenas, ahora ella está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más mercadería en productos comestibles de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
DUO ROSAS DE SAN JUAN

This duo is comprised of 29 year-old Magdalena who is married and a mother of a 7 year-old girl.  Magdalena has been making a living selling consumer products such as corn, rice, sugar, cereal, oil, soda etc. for the last eight years.  In addition to attending her customers every day from 6am to 8pm she also works the weekends selling toast, porridge, bread, delicacies, jello, ice cream, and soft drinks.  She thanks God that her sales are strong and now she is seeking a loan to  purchase more staple food products.

loans.use: to purchase more staple food products.

loans.name: Eryk Jose

texts.es:
Don Eryk tiene la edad de 34 años, habita en Acoyapa chontales con su papá y hermanos son una familia muy unidas, desde hace diez años trabaja en su propio taller de ebanisteria, el que ha establecido con la ayuda de sus Padres y esfuerzo propio; don Eryk se caracteriza por ser una persona honrada trabajadora y social. 

Solicita este prestamo a Kiva para compra de madera como Laurel y Caoba de esta menera incrementar su negocio con el proposito que le genere mayor utilidad y asi poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Sueña con ver su pequeño Taller en una gran empresa manteniendo su negocio surtido de maderas preciosas y convertirse en distribuidor mayorista.
texts.en:
Don Eryk is 34 years old. He lives in Acoyapa Chontales with his father and siblings. They are a very close family. For ten years he has worked in his own furniture making workshop. He established it with the help of his parents and his own hard work. Eryk is described as being an honest, hardworking and social person. 

He is asking  Kiva for a loan to buy wood, such as laurel and mahogany. This way he can grow his business with the purpose of generating more income and thus improving his quality of life. he dreams of having his own big business stocked with a selection of precious woods and becoming a wholesale distributor.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Doña María es madre de familia ella se dedica a vender helados de frutas y también vende choco manías ella nos cuenta que le ha ido muy bien en el negocio y crear cosas nuevas ya que ella es mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora por esa razón está solicitando este crédito para la compra de frutas para la elaboración de helados, nos comenta que es la primera vez que solicita un crédito en kiva y nos promete ser puntual en sus pagos ya que ella piensa que con el apoyo de un crédito podrá seguir luchando por sus hijos y darles una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: María is a wife and mother who sells fruit ice cream and choco manias. She tells us that the business and making new things has gone very well for her. She is a very enterprising and hardworking woman. That is why she is asking for this loan to buy fruit to make ice cream. She tells us that this is the first time she has asked for a Kiva loan and she promises to make her payments on time. She thinks that with the support of the loan she can continue to fight for her children and give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruit to make ice cream.

loans.name: Yila Waleska

texts.es: Yila de 38 años de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos, el mayor de 22, el segundo de 19 y el menor de 10 añitos.  Tiene 16 años de tener su propio negocio de comideria ubicado en Santo Domingo, donde atiende clientela variada.  Esta solicitando su 11vo credito con el objetivo de terminar de embaldozar un pasadizo en su casa ya que con el credito anterior no logro terminar algunos detalles de la ampliacion de su vivienda para el negocio de comedor que tiene, pues como ya lo dice en el credito anterior su negocio ha crecido y quiere brindarles una mejor comodidad para que se sientan mejor atendidos sus clientes, ademas desea comprar productos para el negocio como viveres y otras cositas que necesita en su dispensa.
texts.en: Yila is 38 years old and is single. She has 3 children. The oldest is 22, the second is 19 and the youngest is 10. She has had her own business for 16 years, a restaurant located in Santo Domingo, where she serves various customers. She is asking for her 11th loan with the purpose of finishing putting in a floor in a hallway her house, since with the previous loan she was unable to finish some details in an addition to her home she made for the restaurant she has now. Like she said with the previous loan, her business has grown and she wants to offer the most comfort so that her customers feel well served. She also wants to buy products for her business such as produce and other things that her business needs.

loans.use: to buy produce for her business and to put in a floor.

loans.name: Akuvi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de mèches dans une boutique depuis 2010, Akuvi est aidée par un membre de sa famille dans l’exercice de son activité. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les pays voisins du TOGO. Pour rendre son activité pérenne, elle sollicite de WAGES un montant pour acheter des mèches afin de vendre et avoir des bénéfices. Elle est mariée à un gendarme, mère de 02 enfants âgés de 15 et 10ans et qui vont à l’école.
texts.en: Akuvi has been selling hair extensions in a store since 2010. A family member helps her in the business. She stocks up in Lomé as well as in the countries neighboring Togo. To stabilize her business, she is seeking a loan from WAGES to buy hair extensions for resale at a profit margin. She is married to a policeman and is the mother of two children, 15 and 10 years of age, who are in school.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions.

loans.name: Bawubadi

texts.fr: Ayant pour femme une couturière,  Mr Bawubadi âgé de 38ans et père de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. L’ainé a 12ans et le dernier 01an. Il est revendeur de profession et vend des produits d’alimentation générale dans  une boutique. Son second crédit qu’il sollicite dans notre institution lui servira à acheter des produits d’alimentation générale (riz, huile végétale, sucre, spaghetti) à Lomé. Il voudrait devenir grossiste et aider sa famille à mieux s’épanouir.  Il y a de cela 02ans qu’il est dans cette activité.
texts.en:
Mr. Bawubadi is 38 years old. He is the father of 3 children, 2 of whom go to school. The oldest of his children is 12 years old and the youngest is 1. His wife is a seamstress.

He is a retailer by profession and has been selling groceries in a shop for 2 years. This second loan that he's asking for will help him buy groceries (rice, vegetable oil, sugar, spaghetti) in Lomé. He would like to become a wholesaler and help his family thrive.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Bartolomeu

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta os seus pais e mais 3 sobrinhos que vivem com ele. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério de Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado preço do material e a dificuldade financeira.
texts.en:
Bartolomeu is married and has four children who go to school. He lives in his own house with his family, and he supports his parents and three relatives (nieces or nephews) who live with him.

He is a teacher and is employed by the Ministry of Education. Bartolomeu intends to use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, blocks, iron and other materials) to continue work on his house.

In the future he wants to finish his house and furnish it. To do this, he promises to pay back his loan on time so he can ask Hluvuku for more loans. A challenge he faces is the high price of materials and financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, blocks, iron, etc.) to continue work on his house.

loans.name: Anahi

texts.es: La Sra. Anahi de 24 años de edad es casada y tiene dos hijos. Su esposo y ella trabajan en una fábrica de la localidad y son padres responsables además de unos excelentes trabajadores, solo tienen un problema no tienen un vehículo en el cual transportarse es por eso que piden de nuestra ayuda porque sus hijos aun están en guardería y ellos necesitan de un auto para poder llevar y recoger a sus hijos de la guardería. Cualquier ayuda que se pueda brindar ellos lo agradecerán mucho.
texts.en: Ms. Anahi is 24 years old, married, and has 2 children. She and her husband  work in a local factory and they are responsible parents in addition to being  excellent workers. There is just 1 problem: they have no vehicle in which to transport their family and it is for this reason that they request our help. Their chiidren are in nursery school and they need an automobile to be able to deliver and pick up their children from the nursery. Whatever help you can offer them will be greatly appreciated.

loans.use: buy a vehicle to transport her children to school.

loans.name: Al-Barkh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Barkh.  It consists of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. 

Elham is a 30-year-old woman who is happily single. She lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She is a friendly, enthusiastic, hardworking individual. All of her efforts are geared toward moving herself forward. 

She has a house, but unfortunately she doesn`t have enough money to buy TV, so she has applied for a youth loan to buy TV.

loans.use: to buy TV for her house.

loans.name: Consella

texts.en:
Consella has had five years in farming in her rural home in Nkubu, where she lives with her husband and one child, aged two years. She produces vegetables, beans, and milk for the local market.

Consella has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her buy poultry and build a poultry house. She says the poultry business will enable her have stable income throughout the year, unlike crop farming, which goes by seasons. 

She hopes to lead in poultry farming and meet her family basic needs with much ease.  She mentions lack of adequate rains as the main obstacle.

loans.use: To buy poultry and construct a poultry house.

loans.name: Benjamim

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como sapateiro e tem um negocio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar mercadoria (óleo, feijão, arroz, bebidas, refrescos e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. É portador de dificiencia física, perdeu todos membros inferiores durante a guerra civil, conta com ajuda dos filhos e sua esposa.
No futuro deseja construir dependências para aluguer e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e as dificuldades financeiras.
texts.en:
Benjamin is married and has five children. Two of the children go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else.

He works as a shoemaker and has his own business selling staple items. He intends to use this loan to buy merchandise (oil, beans, rice, beverages, soft drinks and other products) to increase and diversify his merchandise. Benjamin has a physical disability; he lost both legs in the civil war. He receives help from his children and his wife.

He wants to build rooms for rent in the future so he can improve his family's living conditions. To do this, he promises to pay off the loan on time so he can ask Hluvuku for more loans.

The high cost of living and financial problems are a challenge for him.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (oil, beans, rice, beverages, soft drinks, etc.).

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Electronicien de profession, Mr Kokou est père de 04 enfants tous scolarisés. L’ainé a 20ans et le dernier 12ans. Il a pour conjointe une revendeuse et il est âgé de 46ans. C’est en 1992 qu’il a démarré l’activité dans une boutique et il s’y plait bien car cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant de se prendre en charge et d’assurer le bien – être de la famille. Il souhaite acheter des matériaux et appareils électroniques c’est pour cela il sollicite l’aide de notre institution. Il veut réinvestir dans son activité et aider ses enfants dans leurs études.
texts.en:
An electronics engineer by profession, Mr Kokou is the father of 4 children who all go to school. The eldest of his children is 20 years old and the youngest is 12. His wife is a retailer who is 46 years old.

In 1992 he opened a shop. He enjoys the shop because he earns income that allows him to take care of himself and ensure the well-being of his family. 

He would like to buy materials and electronic devices. For this reason, he's asking for the help of our institution (WAGES). He would like to reinvest in his business and help his children with their studies.

loans.use: buy materials and electronic devices.

loans.name: Jose Gregorio

texts.es: Don Jose Gregorio de 52 años de edad, vive en el barrio santa Ana, casado, junto a su esposa procrearon dos hijos los cuales son mayores de edad, ellos ya son independiente,el Sr. Jose labora en su finca que heredó de sus padres ubicada en la comarca betulia, de donde obtiene sus ingresos para mantener su familia, su esposa le ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar, Don jose es una persona muy responsable; con afodenic ha tenido 8 credito y solicita el 9no. credito con el objetivo de realizar mejoras a su vivienda y reparacion de cercas en su finca, por lo que pretende mejorar y asi brindar mayor comodidad a su familia y mantener su hato ganadero en mejora condiciones.
texts.en: Jose Gregorio, 52, lives in the neighborhood of Santa Ana. He is married and has two children who are grown and independent. Jose works on his farm that he inherited from his parents, located in the region of Betulia, and he uses that income to maintain his family. His wife helps him with the household chores. Jose is very responsible. With Afrodenic he has had 8 loans and requests his 9th with the goal of making home improvements and repairing fences on his farm. He plans to make the improvements and in doing so give his family greater comfort and keep his cattle herd in better conditions.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house and his farm's fences.

loans.name: Dúo Fortaleza Group

texts.es: Dúo Fortaleza, este dúo  está integrado por la señora Ana Lilian de 28 años de edad ella tiene 2 hijos uno de ellos es Discapacitado y necesita mucho cuidado y mucha atención medica por esa razón ella se esfuerza mucho trabajando, ella se dedica al cultivo de lechuga, rábanos arveja, etc. Está solicitando este crédito para la compra de semillas y abono para su cultivo y de esa forma tener más oportunidad de ayudar a sus hijos y darles lo necesario para que poco a poco salgan adelante.
texts.en:
This group, Dúo Fortaleza, includes 28-year-old Señora Ana Lilian.  She has two children, one of whom is disabled and needs much care and medical attention.  For this reason, she makes a great effort to work a lot.  She makes a living through growing lettuce, radishes, peas, etc.  

She is asking for the loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming and in this way have another opportunity to help her children and give them what is necessary so that little by little they can get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for farming.

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en:
Lydia is a farmer in Nkubu with over twenty years in active farming. She currently produces beans, potatoes, milk, and vegetables in her rural home, where she lives with her husband and twin children, aged 15 years. She runs her farm with one farm hand.

Lydia has requested a loan of 62,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. She says this will boost her farming income and enable her to pay for the education of her children. She also hopes to establish a retail business that will earn her income on and off season.

Lydia says the main challenge in farming remains the high cost of inputs like fertilizers.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Brian

texts.en:
Brian is the father of two children, aged 18 and 10 years. He is aged 47, and he has been in active farming for fifteen years, with his farm currently producing maize, milk, and vegetables for the local market. He has employed one farm hand.

Brian has made a loan request of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help him venture into poultry farming. He says he will realize good farming income from poultry and take better care of his children, more specifically in terms of education. He aspires to lead in the poultry business in his home area since many farmers have not ventured into poultry farming.

He advocates abolishing interest charges during the grace period for farming loans.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy and sell traditional blouses.

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es: La Sra. Maria de 49 años de edad es casada y tiene 3 hijos, pero solo uno de ellos depende de ella económicamente. Ella tiene su propia tienda de abarrotes y el trabaja en una fabrica de la localidad. Maria pide de nuestra ayuda para comprar mercancía para su negocio ya que este esta en constante crecimiento y quiere ofrecer un mejor surtido a sus clientes además de una mejor calidad en sus productos. Agradecerá la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Maria is 49 years old and is married with three children. Only one of her children depends on her economically. She has her own grocery store and her husband works in a local factory. 

Maria is requesting help to buy merchandise for her business because it is in constant growth and she wants to offer a better supply to her customers, as well as better quality products. She will be thankful for the help provided.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Dúo Atardecer Group

texts.es: Dúo Atardecer está integrado por Reina es soltera y es vendedora de frutas ella cuenta con un puesto en el mercado local de Sumpango Sacatepéquez y vende variedad de frutas su negocio lo tiene desde hace 5 años y cuenta que le ha ido muy bien aunque en algunas temporadas baja la venta pero eso no ha sido obstáculo para ella para poder seguir adelante y seguir luchando para salir adelante y superarse está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más frutas ya que necesita comprar más variedad en frutas para seguir vendiendo.
texts.en: One of the members of Dúo Atardecer is Reina, who is single and sells fruit at a stall in the local market in Sumpango Sacatepéquez. She sells a variety of fruits in her business that she's owned for five years, and she says that it has gone well. Her sales are lower in some seasons but this hasn't been an obstacle to her continuing to move forward and fight to get ahead and improve herself. She is requesting this loan to buy more fruits because she needs to have a greater variety to continue selling.

loans.use: to buy fruit for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers in order to increase his production, and to buy plants so he can replant his land.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel casada cuenta con 56 años de edad vive en casa propia dedicada a las labores del hogar y al cuidado de su parcela desde muy pequeña ella fue enseñada por sus padres a cultivar café con el paso del tiempo su padre le heredo las parcelas en las que hoy trabaja actualmente es productora de café convencional y próximamente producirá café orgánico pues ya esta  en tramite para la conversión  de convencional a orgánico. Isabel sabe que fertilizando sus plantas productivas y cambiando plantas viejas por nuevas lograra aumentar su producción para lograr tal meta pide un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes y plantas nuevas los cuales empleara en su parcela obteniendo con ello una mayor producción en la próximas cosechas ya que al aumentar su producción le generara mayor ganancias económicas las cuales serán empleadas para comprar mas tierras y seguir cultivando café
texts.en:
Isabel is married and is 56 years old. She lives in her own house and is dedicated to her household work and caring for her land. Since she was very small she was taught by her parents to cultivate coffee. With the pass of time, she inherited from her father the land in which she now works. 

She is a conventional coffee producer and soon will produce organic coffee. She is already in the process of converting from conventional to organic. Isabel knows that fertilizing her productive plants and switching old plants for new ones allows her to increase her production to achieve this goal. 

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and new plants which she will plant on her land to achieve with them greater production in the coming harvests. By increasing her production she generates greater earnings. These will be used to buy more land and continue cultivating coffee.

loans.use: to buy plants to begin adding more plants to her parcel of land and to buy fertilizer to increase production.

loans.name: Tontine La Victoire Group

texts.fr: Marié à une ménagère et père de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés, Mr Abiou est né en 1968, cultivateur de profession. Il a démarré son activité depuis 1993 et l’exerce en RÉGION CENTRALE. Il est le responsable du groupement nommé « LA VICTOIRE » constitué d’hommes qui sont tous dans le domaine de la terre. Mr  Abiou   a sollicité ce second crédit pour s’approvisionner en outil de travail. Il veut dans l’avenir épargner, transformer son champ en une grande ferme agricole et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille. Les autres membres du groupe espèrent assurer un bon avenir à leurs familles.
texts.en:
Married to a housewife and father to 3 children of whom 2 go to school, Abiou was born in 1968 and is a farmer by profession. He started his business in 1993 and practices it in the Centrale region. He is the person in charge of the group named "La Victoire" consisting of men who are all in the field of working the land. 

Abiou requested this second loan to stock up in tools. In the future he wants to save, transform his field into a large agricultural farm and ensure the vital needs of his family. The other members of the group hope to ensure a good future for their families.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Dúo Luchadoras De Chajones Group

texts.es:
DÚO LUCHADORAS DE CHAJONES
Este dúo está formado por doña Oralia de los Angeles, es la líder de este grupo y nos cuenta que  tiene 1 hijo y es casada, ella tiene una pequeña tienda y librería, desde ya hace varios años,  también vende ropa de niño,  cerca de su casa, y nos cuenta que está solicitando este crédito porque necesita surtir un poco mas su negocio ya que las tres actividades que tiene han sido muy exitosas, porque el sector en donde ella esta no hay tiendas cerca entonces las personas solicitan mucho los productos que doña Oralia vende además vende fruta y verduras   y evita que las señoras salgan al mercado porque les queda mejor comprar con ella, espera que se le pueda apoyar porque realmente lo necesita.
texts.en: Two Fighting Women of Chajones. This duo was formed by Doña Oralia de los Angeles. She is the leader of this group and tells us that she has one son and is married. She has had a little shop and stationery store for a number of years. She also sells children's clothing near her house. She tells us that she is applying for this loan because she needs to stock her business a little more, since the three businesses that she has have been very successful, because there are no nearby stores in the sector where she is, so the people ask for Doña Oralia's products a lot. In addition, she sells fruits and vegetables. The women don't have to go to the market since it suits them better to buy from her. She hopes that she can be helped because she really needs it.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell

loans.name: David

texts.es: David de 29 años de edad es casado y tiene tres hijos que aun dependen económicamente de el. Su esposa es ama de casa y David por su parte tiene un negocio de juegos inflables. Le esta yendo muy bien en su negocio, esta en constante crecimiento y a sus clientes siempre están satisfechos con el servicio, es por eso que David pide nuestra ayuda para comprar otro juego inflable y seguir expandiendo su negocio ofreciendo siempre la mejor calidad para sus clientes.
texts.en: David is 29 years old and is married. He has three children that still depend on him economically. His wife is a housewife and for his part David has an inflatable toys business. His business is going very well for him. He is in constant growth and his customers are always satisfied with the service. It is for this reason that David is requesting help to buy another inflatable toy and continue expanding his business by always offering the best quality for his clients.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es: Don Cristino tiene la edad de 51 años, habita junto a su familia en casa de los suegros en la comarca las praderas,  es casado, tiene 4 hijos de 18,16,10 y 8 años respectivamente, la esposa le ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar y los hijos ademas de estudiar en los tiempos libres ayudan a su papá en los oficios de agricultura y ganaderia, los ingresos son productos de los trabajos agricolas y ganaderia que realizan en la finca.  El Sr. Cristino ha venido trabajando con creditos en Afodenic los que le han servido de mucho provecho cumpliendo en tiempo y forma lo que ha demostrado gran responsabilid, ahora solicita su 14vo. credito para invertirlo en compra de una Vaca Parida, su proposito es incrementar su hato ganadero y brindar mayor ingresos para la comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Don Cristino is 51 years old and lives together with his family in his parents-in-law's home in the prairie region.  He is married and has four children of the ages 18, 16, 10, and 8 respectively.  His wife helps with the household chores, and the children, in addition to studying, help their father with agricultural and livestock work in their free time.  The income is a product of the agricultural and livestock work that they carry out on the farm.

Señor Cristino has been working with loans from Afodenic which have given him much advantage over time and through which he has shown great responsibility.  He is now asking for his 14th loan in order to invest in buying a dairy cow.  His purpose is to increase his livestock herd and to provide more income for the comfort of his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Duo Luz Divina Group

texts.es: Dúo Luz Divina, Este Dúo está integrado por la señora Elba Resmery, de 22 años de edad tiene 2 hijos menores de edad bajo su responsabilidad que son de 5 y 3 años de edad, todavía necesitan cuidado de ella no solo para que siguán creciendo sino también para darles una mejor educación, ella se dedica a la venta de Ropa típica en su domicilio, el esposo de ella trabaja como carpintero y con el salario que gana apoya a su esposa con los gastos de la familia y también para que ella pueda realizar sus actividades diarias, el sueño de ella es poder tener un local más grande para generar más ganancias y poder seguirles dando estudio a sus hijos y también para que tengan un futuro de más oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en: Luz Divina (Divine Light) Group. This duo was formed by Señora Elba Resmery, who is 22 years old. She has two young children who are her responsibility, who are 5 and 3 years old. They still need her care, not only so that they continue growing but also to give them a better education. She sells traditional clothing in her home. Her husband works as a carpenter and with the salary that he earns helps his wife with the family expenses and also helps her so that she can do her daily work. Her dream is to be able to have a bigger location to generate more earnings and be able to continue educating her children and also to have a future with more work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en: Jessica is 43 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jiminez, Misimis Occidental. She is married with four children. For 3 years, Jessica has operated a sari-sari (general) store where she sells different kinds of basic products such as sugar, salt, cooking oil, soy sauce, food for snacks, and other items. She earns 6,000 PHP a month. Jessica joined GDMPC in 2009. Jessica is requesting a 17,000 PHP loan to purchase new items to expand product offerings. She has a great plan for her future and for the family, and she wants to expand her business, increase her profit, and purchase a transport vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offerings

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es: Jacinto comenzó a trabajar con su madre en las fincas de café y cuando ya era mayor y se casó con Rutila su madre le regaló un terreno para que se pudiera independizar y sacar a delante a su nueva familia. Jacinto tiene 2 hijos que ya están casados pero lo ayudan a trabajar en si finca produciendo café pues desde pequeños les enseño todo lo relacionado con este cultivo. Durante la cosecha que es cuando hay más trabajo Jacinto contrata jornaleros para que lo ayuden pues no se da abasto solo con sus hijos. El café que él produce es orgánico pues no utiliza productos químicos en su parcela. Durante la última cosecha logro producir 4 toneladas y se ha puesto una meta muy alta ya que dentro de 3 años quiere lograr producir 10 toneladas. Para alcanzar esa meta no basta con trabajar mucho, además necesita comprar planta de café, abono y realizar muchas labores de preparación del terreno y para esto él necesita un crédito. Además de producir café tiene sembrado en sus terrenos árboles los cuales le sirven para dar sombra a sus plantas y también vende la madera para tener así un ingreso extra. En total tiene sembrados 300 árboles. En un futuro a Jacinto le gustaría comprar otra casa ya que en la que vive actualmente se la piensa heredar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jacinto began to work with his mother on coffee farms. When he was of independent age and had married Rutila, his mother gave him a piece of land so that he could become independent and move his new family forward. Jacinto has two children that are already married but help him with the work at his farm growing coffee. Since they were small he taught them everything related to this crop. 

During harvesting is when there is more work to do. Jacinto contracts laborers to help him because his children are not enough. The coffee that he grows is organic so he does not use chemical products on his land. During the last harvest he was able to product four tons and has made a very high goal that within the next three years he wants to be able to produce ten tons. In order to reach this goal, hard work is not enough. He also needs to buy coffee plants, fertilizer and do a lot of preparation work for the land. For this reason he needs a loan.

In addition to growing coffee, he is also planting trees on his land which help him by giving shade to his plants. He also sells the wood to have an additional income. In total he has 300 trees planted. In the future Jacinto would like to buy another house because the one that he currently lives in, he plans to pass down to his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and coffee plants.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: Desde que vivía con su madre y su abuelo María Antonia se ha dedicado a producir café ya que es una tradición familiar. Cuando ella se caso con José Luis continuó con estas labores pues él también es productor de café por lo que a María Antonia no le fue difícil acoplarse con las labores del hogar y del campo. María Antonia y su esposo tienen 2 hijos jóvenes que los ayudan a trabajar en el campo pues para ellos el café es un negocio familiar. El café que María Antonia produce es convencional y quiere cambiar su producción a café orgánico. Este proceso le llevara 3 años como mínimo ya que debe ir renovando por partes sus plantas de café y esperar a que comiencen a dar fruto. También necesita de asesoría por parte de la “Unión Regional de Huatusco” para que este proceso se haga de la mejor manera posible. Para comenzar ella necesita un crédito ya que debe renovar parte de su finca y sembrar plantas, así como realizar labores de preparación de la tierra y limpieza. En un futuro de unos 5 años ella espera estar produciendo un total de 10 toneladas lo que hará que sus ingresos mejoren considerablemente y puedan darse ella y su familia un mejor estilo de vida. A ella y a su esposo les gustaría poder mandar a estudiar a sus hijos a la universidad para que tengan en el futuro mejores oportunidades.
texts.en: Ever since she used to live with her mother and her grandfather, Maria Antonia has produced coffee because it is a family tradition. When she got married to Jose Luis she continued this work because he is also a coffee producer. Maria Antonia doesn't find it hard to meet the demands of her work in the home and the field. She and her husband have two young children who help them to work in the field, since for them coffee is the family business. The coffee that Maria Antonia produces is conventional but she would like to change to organic coffee production. This process will take a minimum of three years because she has to make changes to some of her plants and wait for them to begin to produce. She also needs advice from the Union Regional de Huatusco so that the process will be done in the best way possible. In order to get started, she needs a loan so that she can restore part of her farm and plant seedlings, as well as preparing the land and weeding. In five years or so, she hopes to be producing a total of 10 tons which will improve her income considerably and give her family a better lifestyle. She and her husband would like to be able to send their kids to study in the university so that they can have better opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and clean up her farm.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en: Merlinda is a widow who has 5 children. She is 57 years old, and lives in Seti, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Merlinda manages a gardening business for a living and she has been in this business for 5 years. Each month, she earns 4,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2011, Merlinda joined GDMPC. In the future, Merlinda wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en: Lucena is from Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. She is 58 years old. Lucena is married and has nine children. To make a living, Lucena manages a coconut plantation. Lucena been  in business for 2 years. In 2008, Lucena joined GDMPC. Lucena is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Miguel Alejandro

texts.es: El Sr. Miguel de 37 años de edad es casado y tiene 3 hijos. El y su esposa están trabajando en una compañía de mensajería, son unos padres responsables y ahora que tienen un miembro mas en la familia por parte de su hija quien vive con ellos quieren brindarle una mejor calidad de vida es por eso que esta solicitando de nuestra ayuda para terminar de construir un portón para brindarle mas seguridad a toda su familia. El agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en: Miguel is 37 years old and married with 3 children. He and his wife are working for a messenger company. They are responsible parents, and now they have one more family member in their daughter who lives with them. They want to give her a better quality of life; it is because of this that they are requesting help to finish building a door, so they can offer more security to their entire family. He will be grateful for the assistance that can be offered to him.

loans.use: to build an entrance door in his home.

loans.name: Merrydelle Joy

texts.en: Merrydelle Joy is single. She is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. Merrydelle Joy is a farmer and she operates a gardening business to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years and every month she earns 4,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 to pay for labor costs in garden maintenance. Merrydelle Joy is a new member of GDMPC. In the future, she hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs in garden maintenance

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Sra. María de 45 años de edad es casada y con un dependiente económico. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica de la localidad, mientras que ella se dedica a la venta de comida. Con su negocio le ha ido muy bien tanto asi que ya esta planeando expandirlo. Pero por esta ocasión pide de nuestra ayuda para invertir en su negocio, quiere comprar además de mercancía, ollas y sartenes para la elaboración de la comida. Ella agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old, married and has an economic dependent. Her husband works in a local factory and she sells food. 

She has done very well with her business, so much that she is already planning to expand it. However, this time she asks for help to invest in her business. In addition to merchandise, she wants to buy pots and pans to prepare the food. She appreciates the help anyone can provide.

loans.use: to invest in her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase coffee plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Pureza

texts.pt:
Solteira e não tem filhos, vive na casa da sua mãe com seus 2 irmãos.
Trabalha como caixa numa empresa de móveis e tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (roupa, lençóis, sapatos, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja crescer profissionalmente na empresa e que o negócio corra bem, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o volume do seu negocio para obter mais rendimento e a falta de transporte.
texts.en:
Single and without children, Pureza lives in her mother’s house with her two brothers.  

She works as a cashier at a furniture company and has a business selling various goods. 

With this loan, she wants to buy products (such as clothing, sheets, shoes and similar) to increase the inventory of goods she has for resale.

In the future, she wants to professionally grow her business and hopes that it goes well.  She is committed to the repayment of the loan so that in the future, she may request further loans from Hluvuku.

The challenges she faces are to increase the volume of her business for more income and to overcome the lack of transportation.

loans.use: to buy and sell textiles (such as clothes, sheets, shoes and similar)

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is 45 years old and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her five children. She requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan. 

She wants the financing to invest in buying supplies/accessories like cell phone batteries, chargers, casings, head phones, cell phone bags, etc. for her husband’s cell phone accessories shop. As this shop is the only source of income for their family, she wants to expand it through this financing and make her life happy.

He is very experienced and professional in his dealings and has been operating his business for the past three years. Naseem is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for them and bring positive changes in the life of their family.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her husband's cell phone accessories shop.

loans.name: Duo Mujeres Aliadas Group

texts.es: Dúo Mujeres Aliadas, doña Juana es originaria de tecpán tiene 22 años de edad y tiene a su hijo de 3 años de edad ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la crianza de pollos esta grandemente agradecida por el crédito que le otorgaron anterior mente ya que le fue de mucha ayuda para ella, solicita un nuevo crédito para la compra de más materia prima para la confección de tejidos típicos a mano ya que con el primer crédito pudo incrementar un poco más su negocio comprando por mayor, desde ya les desea bendiciones donde quera que este y les da muchas gracias por su ayuda que Dios me Los bendiga.
texts.en:
Belonging to Dúo Mujeres Aliadas, Juana is originally from Tecpán, is 22 years old and has a 3 years old son. For a living, she weaves typical fabrics by hand and raises chickens. 

She greatly appreciates the loan she was granted in the past, because it was very helpful for her. Now she is applying for a new loan in order to buy more raw materials for the weaving of typical fabrics by hand. With her first loan, she increased a little more her business buying in bulk. 

She gives you a blessing, wherever you are, and thanks you for your help. God bless you.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for the weaving of typical fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay laborers

loans.name: Clementa

texts.es: La Sra. Clementa de 55 años, viuda, cuenta con una antigüedad de más de 11 años trabajando en una fábrica de la localidad. Cuenta con casa propia la cual adquirió como compra a terceros, ya cuenta con puertas y ventanas, las cuales no ha instalado porque no está habitada, hasta que la inmobiliaria le entregue todo los documentos y este lista las escrituras. Por lo cual necesita de nuestro apoyo para tramitar las escrituras de su casa.
texts.en: Clementa is 55 years old and is a widow. She has been working for more than 11 years in a local factory. She has her own house, which she bought from a third party. It now has doors and windows, but she hasn’t installed them yet, since no one will live there until the real estate agency gives her all of the documents and the title is ready. She needs our support in order to take care of the paperwork for the title on her house.

loans.use: to take care of the paperwork for the title for her house.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a resident and a farmer in her rural home area in Central Kenya. She is married with three children; the last one is of school-going age. Jane has been in farming for 14 years and currently runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Her farm produces milk, beans and maize for the local market.

Jane has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a chuff cutter to ease her dairy feeding. She says this will also help save her time and reduce the waste of costly dairy feeds. She reiterates the major part of her farming income will go into educating her last-born child.

Jane mentions rampant dairy diseases and pests that result in huge losses to farmers as her major challenges.

loans.use: To buy a chuff cutter.

loans.name: Bernandita

texts.en:
Bernandita is 49 years old. She is married with two children. She resides in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. After five years of being in a service-based type of business activity, Bernandita earns a monthly income of PHP 5,000. 

Bernandita has applied for a loan of PHP 25,000 from GDMPC to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Bernandita hopes to expand her business and to gain more income.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Angie

texts.en:
Angie lives in Oroquieta, Misamis Occidental. She earns a living through proving transportation services. She has been doing this for two years so as to support the needs of her three children. She gets an income of PHP 5,000 a month for this business. For a 28-year old mother, there’s nothing more that can make her happy except to see her children successful in their studies. 

Without hesitation, Angie is borrowing an amount of PHP 15,000 from GDMPC microcredit to repair her transport vehicle used in her business and provide her children a better education. She joined GDMPC in 2011. Her plan in the future is to hopefully improve her business.

loans.use: to repair her transport vehicle used in her business.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James, 56 years old, is a married entrepreneur of Pana-on, Misamis Occidental. He has a child and is earning a living from his transport service business. It started almost five years ago now and he earns PHP 6,000 a month. 

To improve business, James is borrowing an amount of PHP 15,000 from GDMPC micro credit which he joined in 2008. He wants to obtain accessories and tires. Before long, he’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires.

loans.name: Meyveneza

texts.en:
Meyveneza is 33 years old and has been engaged in a retail business for eight years. Due to her diligence, she successfully provides a good source of income. She is aiming for high income that would improve their living conditions. This prompted her to borrow a loan amount of PHP 16,000 to buy goods such as shirts, dresses, pants and skirts. She wants to grow her business so that she can afford to send her two children to school until they finish.

She wishes to uplift her family from deficiency, thus she is working so hard to provide for the needs of her children, especially their educational needs. She hopes, with the help of this loan amount, she will reach her desired net income and be able tp save for their future.

loans.use: to buy goods such as shirts, dresses, pants and skirts.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 42 years old, married, and has three children who live with her. She is from Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. To support her daily needs, Alma runs a small eatery from her home. The foods are personally cooked by her, and each month she is able to earn an income of about PHP 8,000. In 2007, she joined Kiva field partner GDMPC. 

Alma has requested a loan of PHP 30,000 which she intends to use to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She hopes to expand her business and allow her to earn more so she can live better.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok was photographed in from of his own house located in Kompong Cham province. He is 26 years old and married, with two lovely young kids. Sok just owns three piece of farm land which he uses for a rice farming business but the income seems hardly to cover his daily costs. In this regard, Sok also works with his construction team on mobile building sites to add more income to the family. Sok is very happy because his loyal wife helps him earn an income.

Sok has encountered transportation difficulties due to the lack of his own vehicle. He always pays for any taxi services to get his destination. At present, Sok would like to take out a loan for the the sum of KHR 1,200,000 to purchase a used motorcycle for personal use. It’ll easily take him to his workplaces. Sok hopes that lenders will approve his loan and give him a great support.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle for personal use.

loans.name: Adelita

texts.en:
Adelita is a 57-year-old woman who is confident she can lift her family out of their poor living conditions. She did not graduate from college but she promised to herself that she will provide a better living for her family. There are many businesses that she has been involved in, but her clothes-selling business has gone on working. She has been this business for over five years. 

She wants to improve and boost her income from day to day operational sales. This led her to requests a loan of PHP 16,000 to purchase dresses, shirts, blouses, pants and skirts. She hopes to obtain her requested loan to further improve and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase dresses, shirts, blouses, pants and skirts.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: El Sr. Humberto de 69 años de edad es casado y no tiene dependientes económicos. El siempre ha luchado por salir adelante es muy trabajador, maneja una línea de transportes y su esposa es ama de casa. Humberto  en esta ocasión solicita de nuestra ayuda para comprar otro transporte ya que quiere hacer que su negocio crezca y brindarle a su esposa una mejor calidad de vida. Ellos agradecerán la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en: Humberto is 69 years old. He is married and doesn’t have anyone who is economically dependent on him. He has always worked to get ahead and is very hard working. He manages a line of buses, and his wife is a homemaker. Humberto is requesting our help to buy another bus, because he wants to grow his business and provide his wife with a better quality of life. They will be grateful for the help that you are able give.

loans.use: to buy a bus.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a resident of Nkubu in Central Kenya where she has been practicing mixed farming for three consecutive years. She is single with one child aged seven years and schooling. Her farm produce of milk and yams are both sold within the local market to meet her family's basic needs.

Agnes has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her venture into poultry farming which she believes will raise her enough income to educate her child as well as improve their living standards. She plans to start a cereals retail business to supplement her farming income.

Agnes mentions poor development of the local market as the major challenge but appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's financial services.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Rael

texts.en:
Rael is a resident and a farmer in Nkubu area where she lives with her husband. She has six adult children. She has been in farming for nearly 30 years with her farm produce consisting mainly of milk, maize and beans. She runs her farm with one farmhand.

Rael has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds. She believes her farming income will continue to meet her family needs and make her not need to rely on her children for the family's upkeep. She plans to venture into horticultural farming too.

Rael notes that Juhudi Kilimo services have been of great help to smallholder farmers. She however reiterates lack of established local markets continue to pose a significant challenge.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 57 years old, and has been a sari-sari store operator for five years. She is married and is blessed with four children. As of now, she is earning to help her husband in providing for their family. She usually earns an average amount of PHP 200 daily which she uses to buy food for them.

She is requesting a loan amount of PHP 20,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, salt and oil. She wants to provide a variety of goods to increase her sales so as to increase her daily income.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, salt and oil.

loans.name: Ericala

texts.en: Ericala live in the town of Bien Unido. She is  married and has three children. She makes a living by fishing and catching crabs, which she resells in Bien Unido and Trinidad towns. She is asking for a loan to buy gasoline, crab traps and fishing nets. She plans to use these inputs to improve her business and increase her profits for her family. Any additional revenue generated by her business will be for family daily consumption, savings and reinvestment in the same business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, crab traps and fishing nets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay farm laborers.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en: Natividad lives in the village of Villa Concepcion. She is married and has nine children. Natividad has been involved in animal husbandry for the last seven years. She primarily breeds livestock at her home. Now she is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 12,000 to purchase feed, vaccines and additional hogs to raise. She wants to develop her business to earn a higher income and save some of it for any future emergencies in her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vaccines and additional hogs to raise.

loans.name: Jerusha

texts.en:
Jerusha is a farmer in her rural home in Nkubu, Central Kenya, where she lives with her husband and four children aged between 17 and 11 years all of whom are schooling. She has been in active farming for thirteen years with her farm’s current produce consisting mainly of maize and beans.

Jerusha has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy dairy goats. She says she will venture into dairy goats farming due to their resistance to harsh weather conditions and their high nutritional value. She says improvement in her farming income will help boost her bananas retail business she has been running in the local market.

Jerusha mentions poor rains and undeveloped local markets which compels farmers to sell their products to far-off markets as the challenges that need to be addressed.

loans.use: To buy dairy goats.

loans.name: Erna

texts.en: Erna is 42 years old, married, with three children. The oldest child is 17 years old and her youngest is 12.
