loans.use: to buy and to place 2 or 3 more tables in his cafe and to buy sugar, coffee, candy and household goods for his shop

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 24-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and only one sibling. His father is the one responsible for covering their costs and expenses. Youssef is an independent hard worker. He sometimes visits his customers at their places or else he serves them from home if needed. He works in repairing computers and has been involved in this domain for almost seven years until he decided to work on his own.   

Today, he is asking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new laptop for his business in addition to some related supplies. This Kiva loan will definitely ripen his business and permit him to carry on his work in a proper way. Youssef wishes to open a shop where he sells a wide variety of laptops and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to purchase a new laptop for his business in addition to some related supplies.

loans.name: Deyling Soliette

texts.es:
La joven Deyling de 25 años de edad es soltera, trabaja en la Escuela Miguel Larreynaga en colonia el Serrano desde hace 8 años, según referencias  personales es una joven responsable y muy trabajadora, recibe la ayuda economica del padre de su hijo  para los gastos familiares ya que son bien trabajadores y han luchado por gozar de mejoeres condiciones de vida.  

Solicita su crèdito para invertirlo en repello de su vivienda y acondicionar y asi poco a poco ir mejorando su vivienda y gozar de estabilidad laboral para que no les falte lo basico en el hogar a su linda familia.
texts.en:
Deyling, a young woman of 25, is single and has worked for 8 years in the Escuela Miguel Larreynaga (Miguel Larreynaga School) in the El Serrano community. According to personal references, she is a responsible and very hardworking young lady. She receives economic support from the father of her child for the family’s expenses, since they are so hardworking and they have fought to have better living conditions. 

She is requesting her loan to use for plastering the walls in her house and to upgrade it, so little by little she can improve her home and achieve working stability, and her lovely family will not lack for any basics in their home.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Nemecio

texts.es: Nemecio tiene 32 años, viven en Ivirgarzama y actualmente trabaja en una empresa de mantenimiento de caminos vial AMVI, en Valle Sacta, desde niño ayuda  a sus padres en  la agricultura, vive solo y no tiene hijos, estudio Administración de Empresas en la Universidad Mayor de San Simón, siempre  se mantuvo al margen de la agricultura, porque pensaba volver a trabajar en la parcela de su madre, hace dos años que sufrió un accidente de transito, se fracturo parte de su hueso lumbar, ahora esta recuperándose, pero se siente bien para trabajar en el campo, aprovecha los fines de semanas porque los otros días trabaja en la empresa, actualmente tiene 1 ha., de piña para exportación, para que tenga mayor rendimiento necesita hacer mantenimiento con abono químico, es por tal razón tiene el motivo de solicitar un crédito, esto le ayudara a mejorar el rendimiento de su cultivo.
texts.en:
Nemecio is 32 years old. He lives in Ivirgarzama and currently works at a road maintenance company, AMVI in Valle Sacta. He has helped his parents farm since he was a child. He lives alone and has no children. He studied business administration at Mayor de San Simón University. 

He always stayed apart from farming, because he intended to return to work on his mother's parcel of land. Two years ago, he suffered a traffic accident and fractured part of his lumbar bone. Now he is recovering, but feels well enough enough to work in the fields. He takes advantage of the weekends, because the other days he works at the company. 

Currently he has one hectare of pineapple for export. In order to have greater yield, he needs to maintain it with chemical fertilizer. It is for this reason that  he is applying for a loan. It will help him improve his crop yield.

loans.use: To buy chemical fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 44 años actualmente está separado de su esposo, tiene  6 hijos de los cuales 2 aun dependen de sus ingresos y están estudiando, las dos hijas mayores  trabajan ya que no lograron terminar ni el bachillerato, la señora María y sus hijos viven en la comunidad de Kara Kara en la ciudad de Cochabamba en su propia casa,  la principal actividad de la señora María es la venta de comida, todos por las mañanas  los días vende en un puesto  que está ubicado en la calle en la misma zona donde vive y por las tardes en un kiosco para los trabajadores de una empresa de limpieza. Con la ayuda de sus hijos la señora María trabaja mucho todos los días para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que no cuentan con el apoyo económico de su  marido.
El destino del crédito es para la compra de mesas y sillas para el kiosco, con lo cual mejorara y ampliara  las condiciones de venta y los clientes podrán servirse su plato de comida más cómodamente.
Entre sus sueños y metas esta que sus 4 hijos puedan estudiar una carrera profesional para que de esa manera puedan tener un mejor nivel de vida y en futuro tener un restaurant propio ya que la señora maría lo que mejor hace es cocinar.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old and is currently separated from her husband. She has 6 children, 2 of whom are in school and still dependent on her income. The two oldest daughters work, since they were not able to finish their bachelor’s degrees. María and her children live in their own house in the community of Kara Kara in the city of Cochabamba. 

Maria’s work is selling food; every morning she sells from a spot located on the street in the same area where she lives, and in the afternoons from a food stand for the hardworking employees of a cleaning service. With the help of her children, María works a lot every day in order to get her children ahead, since they cannot count on the economic support of her husband. 

The purpose of the loan is to purchase tables and chairs for the stand, with which she will improve and expand her selling conditions, and her customers will be able to eat their plates of food more comfortably. Among her dreams and goals are that her 4 sons will be able to study for a professional career, so that in this way they can have a better standard of living; and in the future, to have her own restaurant, because what María does best is cook!

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for her stand.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es: Rufina, es una persona de 32 años de edad de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo las cuales son sus hijas; la actividad económica principal de la clienta es la producción agrícola, produce papa, haba y arveja las cuales siembran en sus propias parcelas, las mismas que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de T'oqo Rancho del municipio de Tíraque distante aproximadamente a unos 70 Km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Por su parte el esposo de la clienta es empleado en una empresa constructora, presta el servicio de operador de maquinaria pesada por el cual tiene una remuneración salarial mensual. Finalmente la clienta y su esposo manifiestan tener ganas de poder superarse y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de un lote en la ciudad de Santa Cruz y de tal forma mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rufina is 32 years old and married. She went as far as primary school. She lives in her own house and has three financial dependents; her daughters who are in her care. 

The client's principal livelihood is farming. She grows potatoes, lima beans and peas, that she plants on her own parcels of land. These are located in the community of T'oqo Rancho in Tíraque municipality, approximately 70 km from the city of Cochabamba. 

For his part, the client's husband is employed by a construction company. He works as a heavy equipment operator, and receives a monthly salary. 

Finally, the client and her husband say they are eager to improve themselves, and for this they see the need to apply for investment capital, in order to purchase a lot in the city of Santa Cruz, and that way improve their family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy land.

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is a friendly middle-aged woman. She is 50 years old. She got married many years ago and has four working siblings. She’s really proud of her family and ready to do her best to be able to offer them a respectable life. 

Since their marriage, May’s husband has managed the family expenses and still does. And since May noticed that their income did not satisfy their needs, she decided to open her own clothing shop with the small amount of money she already had. She sells a wide variety of women's clothes and lingerie from which she earns a fair amount of money daily. 

To better develop her work, she’s requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, t-shirts, lingerie and many other items. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and thus improve her income.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, t-shirts, lingerie and many other items.
